Pok\u00e9 Ball Mods.embed: {"title":"Pok\u00e9 Ball Mods","description":"You may craft any of the Pok\u00e9 Ball Modifications on the next page.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Jailbreaker"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Zephyr Shield.embed: {"title":"Zephyr Shield","description":"Your Flying-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Zephyr Shield as a Standard Action Interrupt, or as a Shift Action during their turn. If they do, until the end of the user's next turn, all ranged attacks targetting them take a -1 penalty to Accuracy and -10 penalty to damage, they become immune to the effects of Moves with the Powder keyword, and they do not lose Hit Points from Weather effects. Additionally, if Zephyr Shield is used as a Standard Action, that Pok\u00e9mon may use the Resolution Effect of a Flying-Type Move with the Set- Up keyword on their next turn, skipping the Set-Up phase.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Celerity, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Witch Hunter.embed: {"title":"Witch Hunter","description":"You gain the \"Psionic Sight\" Feature, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. If you already had the Psionic Sight Feature, you instead gain another Feature for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Occultism Research Field, Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Major Gift - March of the Colossus.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - March of the Colossus","description":"Target: Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, the target has their Attack and Speed halved. At the end of the third round, increase the target\u2019s Attack and Speed by two Combat Stages each."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hands of the Creator"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Major Gift - Seed Flare.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Seed Flare","description":"You learn the Move Seed Flare.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Pure Breathing, Major Gift - Sprouter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Hydration.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Hydration","description":"You gain the Hydration Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Sailor's Guardian"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Affliction Techniques.embed:
{"title":"Affliction Techniques","description":"If the target successfully cures the target of its linked Status Affliction, the item has additional effects.
»Antidote: The target gains +1 Special Defense Combat Stage.
» Burn Heal The target gains +1 Defense Combat Stage.
»Ice Heal: The target gains +1 Attack or Special Attack Combat Stage
»Paralyze Heal:The target gains +1 Speed Combat Stage.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Patch Cure, Expert Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP — Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Antidote, Burn Heal, Ice Heal, or Paralyze Heal"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.7"}}

Calculated Assault.embed: {"title":"Calculated Assault","description":"In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Smart Scheme Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Smart-Type Move"},{"name":"In Battles","value":" Choose one"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Genjutsu.embed: {"title":"Genjutsu","description":"You form an Illusion around yourself. This Illusion may be used to hide yourself in a shroud of darkness if in darkness, or to make yourself look like a mundane object (such as a crate, potted plant, or similar). The Illusion can even fool Aura, concealing you from Aura Sight for its duration. However, the Illusion requires complete concentration, and is broken if you take any actions at all. Anyone that interacts with the Illusion directly may make an Occult Education or Intuition Check with a DC equal to 10 plus your Stealth Rank; if they succeed, the Illusion is broken.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja, Adept Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Strike of the Whip.embed:
{"title":"Strike of the Whip","description":"You may apply 1 or more of the following effects to the Pokémon hit by Press:
» Give the target 1 Injury and a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.
» Spend 1 AP and cure the target of Confusion, Infatuation, Rage, and Suppression.
» Use an [Order] you know with targets on the target as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster, Press"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use Press"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Bigger and Boulder.embed: {"title":"Bigger and Boulder","description":"All targets hit by the triggering Move are pushed a number of meters equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank or less, and they become Vulnerable for one full round. Create a Stealth Rock Hazard adjacent to each foe hit this way.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Gravel Before Me, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Rock-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Reckless Advance.embed: {"title":"Reckless Advance","description":" While this Feature is Bound, increase the damage rolls of the target\u2019s damaging melee attacks by +8, and these attacks Trip targets on Accuracy Rolls of 18+. When the target of Reckless Advance hits with a damaging melee attack, they become Vulnerable for one full round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Nature's Embrace.embed: {"title":"Nature's Embrace","description":"You learn 2 Moves chosen from the list below, marked with the Rank of this Feature you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Druid"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Survival or General Education"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Survival or General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

Slow or Steady.embed: {"title":"Slow or Steady","description":"Choose Analytic or Battle Armor. You gain the chosen ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fortress"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Pok\u00e9 Ball Crafter.embed: {"title":"Pok\u00e9 Ball Crafter","description":"You may craft Dusk, Dive, Heal, Luxury, Net, Nest, Quick, Repeat, or Timer Balls for $700. Requires access to a Pok\u00e9 Ball Tool Box.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Basic Balls, Poke\u0301 Ball Repair, Expert Technology"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Trick Shot.embed: {"title":"Trick Shot","description":" While this Feature is Bound, decrease the Accuracy Roll of the target\u2019s damaging ranged attacks by -2. The Critical Hit range of those attacks is increased by +3. This Feature does not affect Moves without an AC value.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Capricious Whirl.embed: {"title":"Capricious Whirl","description":" While this Feature is Bound, the target has a +3 bonus to its Evasion but deals 5 less damage with all damaging attacks.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Long Shot.embed: {"title":"Long Shot","description":" The target\u2019s damaging ranged attacks have their range doubled until the end of their next turn, and deal X additional damage. X is equal to the distance in meters that the attack traveled. Long Shot does not increase the size of area of effect attacks. If attacks altered by Long Shot are Critical Hits, add the value of the Damage Dice Roll an additional time to the total damage.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Sentinel Stance.embed: {"title":"Sentinel Stance","description":" Until the end of your next turn, the target may attempt to Intercept attacks for allies as a Shift Action. If they do so, they gain 10 Damage Reduction against the attack. If the target is also under the effect of Brace for Impact, they may gain 5 Damage Reduction from it as if they had used a self-targeting Status Move.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Pinpoint Strike.embed: {"title":"Pinpoint Strike","description":" Increase the Accuracy and Effect Range of the target\u2019s damaging attacks by +2. These attacks deal 5 less damage, before applying weakness and resistance.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Archival Training.embed: {"title":"Archival Training","description":"Each Rank, you gain an Archive.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"All Rank Prerequisites","value":"Chronicler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Dazzling Dervish.embed: {"title":"Dazzling Dervish","description":" Until the end of their next turn, the target adds their non-stat Evasion to their Movement Capabilities and whenever they attack a foe or Shift through a square occupied by a foe, that foe suffers a -3 penalty to all rolls until the end of their next turn. This effect may only affect a foe once per round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Stone Stance Mastery.embed: {"title":"Stone Stance Mastery","description":"Whenever you bind Stone Stance, you may choose two Stances and apply the effects of both.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stone Stance, Master Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Major Gift - Fairy Aura.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Fairy Aura","description":"You gain the Fairy Aura Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Bounty of Life"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Strike Again!.embed: {"title":"Strike Again!","description":" The target may immediately take an additional Standard Action to use an At-Will attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Brace for Impact.embed: {"title":"Brace for Impact","description":" While this Feature is Bound, once a round, when the target uses a self-targeting Status Move, they may gain 5 Damage Reduction until the end of their next turn. They may also activate this effect as a Standard Action.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders] [Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" Your Poke\u0301mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Nurse.embed: {"title":"Nurse","description":"During this Extended Rest, Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers in your care gain the benefits listed below. The AP Drain cost from triggering this Feature is applied after the Extended Rest is completed and AP Drain has otherwise been restored.\n\u00bb They heal 1\/8th of their Max Hit Points per half hour of rest instead of 1\/16th (does not stack with Bandages).\n\u00bb If the Extended Rest lasts at least 6 hours, they may remove 1 Injury.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Drain 2 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You take an Extended Rest"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.7"}}

Type Methodology.embed: {"title":"Type Methodology","description":"Effects depend on whether your Pok\u00e9mon has the Tolerance or Exploit ability:\n\u00bb Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon with Tolerance takes Super-Effective damage from a Tagged foe, your Pok\u00e9mon may lose 2 Momentum to Resist that attack one step.\n\u00bb Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon with Exploit deals Resisted damage to a Tagged foe, your Pok\u00e9mon may lose 2 Momentum to increase the effectiveness of the attack one step.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Effective Methods, Adept Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"See Effect"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Iron Grit.embed: {"title":"Iron Grit","description":"When this Feature becomes Bound, the target gains +1 Defense Combat Stage. While the Feature remains bound, the target's Defense Stat cannot be lowered, and its Defense Combat Stages cannot be lowered.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Polished Shine, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Stat Embodiment.embed:
{"title":"Stat Embodiment","description":"Your Pokémon gains an Ability, based on your Chosen Stat, for the remainder of the Scene. Switching does not end this effect. Stat Embodiment may only grant one Ability to a Pokémon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability.
» Attack Aces give Sheer Force or Defiant
» Defense Aces give Filter or Battle Armor
» Special Attack Aces give Tinted Lens or Competitive
» Special Defense Aces give Multiscale or Tolerance
» Speed Aces give Speed Boost or Vanguard","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Stat Ace Features, Expert Command or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP — Swift Action, Priority (Limited)"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.113"}}

Style Entrainment.embed:
{"title":"Style Entrainment","description":"Your Pokémon gains one of the following Abilities corresponding to your chosen Contest Stat for the rest of the Scene, even if it is switched out. Style Entrainment may only grant one Ability to a Pokémon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability.
» Beauty gives Gentle Vibe or Serene Grace
» Cool gives Defiant or Sniper
» Cute gives Cute Charm or Cute Tears
» Smart gives Analytic or Anticipation
» Tough gives Sturdy or Intimidate","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Style Expert Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP — Swift Action, Priority (Limited)"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Proper Care.embed:
{"title":"Proper Care","description":"You gain additional bonuses to using Restoratives and Features while in a Field Clinic, Poke Center, Hospital, or other dedicated healing space that lets you access supplies.
» When you trigger First Aid Expertise here, the injury that is Removed does not count towards the total number of Injuries that may be removed each day.
» When you trigger Nurse here, Bandages cure 1 Injury after three hours, in addition the injury healed after 6 hours.
» All Restoratives heal an additional 5 Hit Points. This stacks with the bonus granted by Field Clinic.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"I'm a Doctor, Field Clinic, Expert Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.6"}}

Flourish.embed:
{"title":"Flourish","description":"Your Pokémon's Status-Class Moves that affect foes ignore non-Stat Evasion. They may Critically Hit like damaging Moves on a roll of 20. Upon such a Critical Hit, choose one effect from the list below. This Critical Hit rate may be modified as normal.
» If the Move inflicts a Status Affliction with a Save Check, all affected targets get a -4 penalty to their first Save Check.
» If the Move lowers Combat Stages, then pick a Stat that the Move lowers and lower it by 1 additional Combat Stage.
» Your Pokémon gains a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Trickster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Close Quarters Mastery.embed: {"title":"Close Quarters Mastery","description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target's Fighting-Type Moves cause foes to become Marked by the target for 1 full round. If the target is a Fighting- Type Pok\u00e9mon, they may also Mark the Foe for one full round when hitting with a Grapple, Trip, or Push Maneuver.\nMarked Foes provoke an attack of Opportunity from the Pok\u00e9mon that marked them if they Shift out of an adjacent square into a square that is not adjacent, even if they use a Disengage Maneuver. Targets cannot be Marked by more than one Pok\u00e9mon at a time.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Fighting)"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Gravel Before Me.embed: {"title":"Gravel Before Me","description":"Create a Stealth Rock Hazard adjacent to your Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Rock)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Rock-Type Pok\u00e9mon misses all targets with a Rock-Type attack, receives an Injury, suffers a Critical Hit, or Faints."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Beautiful Ballet.embed: {"title":"Beautiful Ballet","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Beauty Stat from Poffins may activate Beautiful Ballet as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert (Beauty), Novice Intuition"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1","value":" Captivate, Mist"},{"name":"Rank 2","value":" Lovely Kiss, Mean Look"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Noise Complaint.embed: {"title":"Noise Complaint","description":"You learn the Moves Uproar and Hyper Voice.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cacophony, Expert Charm or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Glamour Mastery.embed: {"title":"Glamour Mastery","description":"Choose Magic Guard or Magic Bounce. You gain the Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Glamour Weaver Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Major Gift - Space Distortion.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Space Distortion","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Exchange the positions of up to three target Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers within 10 meters."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Realm Portal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Corrupt Reality.embed: {"title":"Corrupt Reality","description":"You may force the foe to reroll that roll.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender, Adept Perception, Occult Education, or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Any roll made by a foe"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Commander's Voice.embed: {"title":"Commander's Voice","description":"You may give two different [Orders] as a single Standard Action, or you may give one set of [Orders] as a Swift Action.\nIf this is used to use Focused Command and another [Order] that has targets, the second Order applies to both Pok\u00e9mon you are commanding that turn. Commander's Voice doesn't allow you to use Focused Command as a Swift Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two Features with the [Orders] tag"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Shared Mortality.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Shared Mortality","description":"Target: An Allied Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Add your remaining Hit Points with those of your Target. You may split these Hit Points as you wish between you and your Target."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Mortality Duo Major Gift"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Capsule Science.embed:
{"title":"Capsule Science","description":"You learn the Cap Cannon, Cap Ammo, and Wonder Launcher recipes, and you gain the following additional effects when using those items.
»Bean Caps
»Glue Caps
»Net Caps
» Wonder Launcher","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Improvised Gadgets, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.5"}}

Major Gift - Flash Fire.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Flash Fire","description":"You gain the Flash Fire Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Power Pirouette.embed:
{"title":"Power Pirouette","description":"Choose one effect:
» All adjacent targets are Confused.
» You gain +1 Combat Stage to a Stat of your choice not raised by the triggering Move.
» Destroy all Hazards within 5 meters, and remove Leech Seed, Trapped, and Stuck from yourself.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Form; Expert Acrobatics, Athletics, or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You perform a Dance Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Apparition.embed: {"title":"Apparition","description":"When wielding Melee Weapons, you may use Occult Education or Intimidate instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to resist Disarm Maneuvers, and to qualify for a Weapon's Moves. Your Weapon Attacks always treat you as having the Reach Capability, and foes may not activate Reaction effects against them that specify being hit by a Melee Attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Ghost), Novice Intimidate, Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Tough as Nails.embed: {"title":"Tough as Nails","description":"You learn the Moves Endure and Slack Off.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Roughneck Features, Master Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Action Hero Stunt.embed: {"title":"Action Hero Stunt","description":"Instead of using a Skill for this Check, your Pok\u00e9mon rolls their Cool Dice from Poffins and adds their number of Cool Dice from Stats as a modifier. For example, a Pok\u00e9mon with 5d6 Cool from Poffins and 2d6 from Attack rolls 5d6+2. Skill Checks invoked by Intercepting attacks, Combat Maneuvers, Moves, and Abilities don't trigger this Feature.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cool Conduct Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon makes a Skill Check for a dramatic, high risk action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Learn From Your Mistakes.embed: {"title":"Learn From Your Mistakes","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may re-roll the Skill Check with a Bonus equal to its number of Smart Dice from Poffins.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Smart Scheme Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon fails a Skill Check."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Chitin Shield.embed: {"title":"Chitin Shield","description":"The effect misses, and your Pokemon becomes immune to that Move for the rest of the Scene. Chitin Shield may be triggered once per Scene per Pokemon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Insectoid Utility, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Bug-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a Status- Class Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Psionic Sponge.embed: {"title":"Psionic Sponge","description":"Your Psychic-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Psychic Sponge as a Shift Action to add a Psychic Type Move known by an ally within X meters to their Move List until the end of their turn. This does not allow them to have duplicate Moves in their Move List. This Feature may only be used once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene, and X is equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Psychic)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Too Spooky.embed: {"title":"Too Spooky","description":"Choose Pressure or Frighten. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Apparition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Silent Assassin.embed: {"title":"Silent Assassin","description":"While this Feature is Bound, your Struggle Attacks and Weapon Attacks deal Ghost-Type Damage, and you gain the Dead Silent Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Apparition, Adept Intimidate or Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Push it to the Limit.embed: {"title":"Push it to the Limit","description":"Immediately gain one Injury before resolving the triggering attack. You gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points and may cure yourself of a Persistent Status Af- fliction. The triggering attack doubles your damage bo- nus from Lessons in Rage and Pain.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lessons in Rage and Pain, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Berserker Move or Weapon Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Raging Winds.embed: {"title":"Raging Winds","description":"You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Raging Winds Rank you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Wind Runner"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Acrobatics or Perception"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Master Acrobatics or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.75"}}

Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation","description":"You gain a Capability based on which Legendary Bird or Beast granted you this Feature. Articuno grants Freezer, Moltres and Entei grant Firestarter, Zapdos and Raikou grant Zapper, and Suicune grants Fountain.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Rouse the Dragon's Blood.embed: {"title":"Rouse the Dragon's Blood","description":"For 1 full round, the next Herald of Pride Move you use against the triggering foe cannot miss, cannot be Intercepted, and effects that would cause it to miss cannot be activated against it.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Herald of Pride, Expert Command or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You suffer a Critical Hit or gain an Injury from a foe's attack"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.67"}}

Man of Steel.embed: {"title":"Man of Steel","description":"You learn the Moves Meteor Mash and King's Shield. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Master Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Major Gift - Phasing.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Phasing","description":"You gain the Phasing Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Alien Countenance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Hydro Jet.embed: {"title":"Hydro Jet","description":"Hydro Jet's effect depends on if the triggering Move was Melee or Ranged.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Call The Current Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a damaging single target Water-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Experimental AI.embed: {"title":"Experimental AI","description":"Increase the maximum complexity of all Pok\u00e9bots you create by 2, and increase the maximum complexity of Pok\u00e9bots you can control by 2.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Engineer, Master Tech Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Explosive Runes.embed: {"title":"Explosive Runes","description":"You may use Hidden Power, originating the attack from the location of the targeted Glyph. Use your own Stats and Hidden Power values to calculate damage. Using this Feature causes the Glyph to become visible and glow for a minute afterwards.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Occult Education, Glyph, Hidden Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Glyph you have put down, regardless of distance"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.52"}}

Jailbreaker.embed: {"title":"Jailbreaker","description":"You may craft any Pok\u00e9 Ball Case Recipe for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Jailbreaker Research Field, Basic Balls"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Go, Fight, Win!.embed: {"title":"Go, Fight, Win!","description":"Choose and perform one of the cheers below. You may perform each Cheer only once per Scene.\n\u00bb Show Your Best!\n\u00bb Don't Stop Now!","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Moment of Action, Expert Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"I Believe In You!","value":" All allies on the field gain a +2 bonus to Evasion for one full Round."}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.3"}}

Nimble Steps.embed: {"title":"Nimble Steps","description":"You may perform the Disengage Maneuver as a Swift Action.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Skirmisher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.61"}}

Fashionista.embed: {"title":"Fashionista","description":"You may craft any Fashionista Recipe for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two of Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition at Novice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Voice Lessons.embed: {"title":"Voice Lessons","description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon's Moves with the Sonic keyword gain the Friendly keyword. Voice Lessons may not affect the Move Perish Song. Additionally, whenever your Pok\u00e9mon use a Move with the Sonic Keyword in a Contest, they may roll +1d6.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Noise Complaint"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Mettle.embed: {"title":"Mettle","description":"Resolve Damage as if the triggering attack was resisted one step. The triggering foe then loses 2 Combat Stages in the Attack Stat used by the triggering Attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Roughneck"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"You take Massive Damage or Intercept a Damaging Attack."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Bag of Tricks.embed: {"title":"Bag of Tricks","description":"You gain two Trickster Techniques of your choice, found on the next page.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Trickster"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Trickster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Fairy Rite.embed: {"title":"Fairy Rite","description":"Your Fairy-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Fairy Rite as a Standard Action to lose any number of Hit Points, up to a maximum equal to your Pok\u00e9mon's Level, and heal an adjacent Ally by that many Hit Points. Then, if your Fairy-Type Pok\u00e9mon has any Fairy Lights, they may immediately expend any Fairy Lights to gain a Tick of Hit Points, or cause an ally within 6 meters to gain a Tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fairy Lights, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon creates Fairy Lights as a Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Effective Methods.embed: {"title":"Effective Methods","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 2 Tutor Points and gains your choice of the Exploit or Tolerance Ability. You may only target a Pok\u00e9mon once with Effective Methods.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Duelist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Master of Arms.embed: {"title":"Master of Arms","description":"You learn the Call to Arms and Unlimited Steel Works Talents.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Expert Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Mt. Moon Blues.embed: {"title":"Mt. Moon Blues","description":"You learn the Moves Sing and Supersonic","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Musician"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

First Blood.embed: {"title":"First Blood","description":"If you have a Pok\u00e9mon turn available this round or next, your Pok\u00e9mon may use a Move as an Interrupt as soon as it is sent out. This consumes your Pok\u00e9mon turn for the round (or the following round) as normal.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tag In, Master Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You release a Pok\u00e9mon from its Pok\u00e9 Ball"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Rider.embed: {"title":"Rider","description":"While you are Mounted on a Pokemon under the effects of Agility Training, the bonuses from Agility Training are doubled.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mounted Prowess, Agility Training, Novice Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Major Gift - Relic Song.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Relic Song","description":"You learn the Move Relic Song.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Soundproof"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Cutthroat.embed: {"title":"Cutthroat","description":"You may use Rogue Moves as Weapon Moves when wielding Small Melee Weapons or Short Ranged Weapons. If you do, Rogue Moves instead have the same Range as your Weapon. Additionally, you may qualify for Weapon Moves for Small Melee or Short Ranged Weapons and resist Disarm Maneuvers when wielding such Weapons using any Rogue Skill.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Push Buttons.embed: {"title":"Push Buttons","description":"Your Social Moves' Frequency is not Expended if they miss. You gain the Demoralize Edge, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. Its effects for Status Moves now trigger on 18+, and Social Moves that activate this \"Crit\" Range cause their targets to lose a tick of Hit Points. If you already have Demoralize, you may gain another Edge for which you meet the prerequisites.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Provocateur"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Gneiss Aim.embed: {"title":"Gneiss Aim","description":"The Move gains the Smite keyword for that use.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Gravel Before Me, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon misses with a Damaging Rock- Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Shrug Off.embed: {"title":"Shrug Off","description":"Once per day, each of your Pok\u00e9mon may spend a Shift Action to remove 1 Injury from themselves; this may also be activated as a Free Action whenever your Pok\u00e9mon Take a Breather.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Staying Power"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Clear Shot.embed: {"title":"Clear Shot","description":"The target is considered Vulnerable against this attack, and you increase your Critical Hit range by +4 for this attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman, Expert Perception or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make a ranged Weapon Attack against a target with no other combatants or Rough or Blocking Terrain within 2 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

I'm a Doctor.embed: {"title":"I'm a Doctor","description":"Each Rank, you gain one of Field Clinic or Medic Training and one of Nurse or First Aid Expertise.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][Gift]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Medic"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Medic, Adept Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.6"}}

Capture Specialist.embed: {"title":"Capture Specialist","description":"You gain two Capture Techniques of your choice, found on the next page. You must meet any prerequisites of the Technique.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, or Survival at Novice; Guile, or Perception at Novice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.78"}}

Mystic Defense.embed: {"title":"Mystic Defense","description":"You learn the Moves Light Screen and Safeguard.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Pact Gift.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift","description":"You gain your Patron\u2019s Pact Gift. Lower Pantheon Legendaries do not have Pact Gifts.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All of your Patron\u2019s Major Gifts, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.45"}}

Psychic Resonance.embed: {"title":"Psychic Resonance","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use the Move Encore against the triggering foe, as if it was on their Move List.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Psionic Sponge, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe with a Psychic-Type Status Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Sign Mastery.embed: {"title":"Sign Mastery","description":"You acquire two Blessings in the form of Signs, marked with the Sign Mastery Rank you are gaining or lower. You must additionally meet any Prerequisites of the Blessing.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4][PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Signer, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" A Major Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" All your Patron\u2019s Major Gifts, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 4 Prerequisites","value":" A Pact Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":" If your Patron does not have a Pact Gift, you instead require all their Major Gifts to attain Rank 4."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.46"}}

Lifelong Learning.embed: {"title":"Lifelong Learning","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may have up to 4 Moves from their Move List come from TMs or Move Tutors.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Move Tutor, one Mentor Skill at Master Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Crystal Resonance.embed: {"title":"Crystal Resonance","description":"You roll an additional 3d6 when determining how many Shards you find when Dowsing.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Crystal Artificer, Skill Stunt (Dowsing)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.142"}}

Experimental Designs.embed:
{"title":"Experimental Designs","description":"Choose an Augmentation the target has and apply the upgrade below. Experimental Designs may affect a target twice.
»Enhanced Sight
»Smart Vision
»Synthetic Muscle
»Embedded Weaponry
»Wired Reflexes
»Medical Nanobots
»Dermal Plating
»Thermal-Optic Camo","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Upgrader, Master Technology Edu"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will — Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"You or your Pokémon with Augmentations"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Warped Transmission.embed: {"title":"Warped Transmission","description":"All adjacent foes to the square you end in after teleporting or using Ally Switch have their Evasion lowered by 3 for one full round and cannot trigger Attacks of Opportunity against you for Shifting until the end of your next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Farcast, Master Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You activate the Teleporter Capability or use the Move Ally Switch"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Major Gift - Glitch Message.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Glitch Message","description":"Target: Electronic Communication","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You must use Glitch Message targeting one instance of electronic communication you are currently aware of in your vicinity, such as an email being typed at the computer next to you or a text message someone is sending. You may view and edit the contents of the message before it gets electronically transmitted without the sender being aware of an issue. On extended communications such as a phone call or video conference, Glitch Message works on one minute\u2019s worth of communication per activation."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Intuitive Sabotage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Telekinetic (Feature).embed: {"title":"Telekinetic (Feature)","description":"You gain the Telekinetic Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic), Iron Mind"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Look and Learn.embed: {"title":"Look and Learn","description":"When you activate Look and Learn, you may gain any of the Features below even though they are Features from other Classes. You do not need to meet their normal prerequisites, but you must meet their Prerequisites listed here. Look and Learn can be used two times; once to learn a Feature from the \"Scene Features\" List, and once to learn a Feature from the \"Action Point Features List\".","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hobbyist, Expert General Education or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"x2 Uses \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.86"}}

Polished Shine.embed: {"title":"Polished Shine","description":"The Effect Range of your Pok\u00e9mon's Steel-Type Moves is increased by +2.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Steel)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Power Chord.embed: {"title":"Power Chord","description":"Make a Charm or Focus Check, and add your Special Attack. Foes in the area of effect take Special Normal-Type Damage equal to the result.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Noise Complaint, Master Charm or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You play a Song"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Small Prophecies.embed: {"title":"Small Prophecies","description":"Roll 1d20 and note the result. Until the end of your next turn, you may choose to replace a single d20 roll you or a willing ally makes with the noted result.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Divination, Adept Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Major Gift - Pure Breathing.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Pure Breathing","description":"You are immune to the Moves Rage Powder, Poison Gas, Poisonpowder, Sleep Powder, Smog, Smokescreen, Spore, Stun Spore, and Sweet Scent.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Plant Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Emergency Release.embed: {"title":"Emergency Release","description":"The next Pok\u00e9mon you send out is treated as if the recalled Pok\u00e9mon had used Baton Pass on it.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler, Expert Acrobatics or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Shift Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Firebrand.embed: {"title":"Firebrand","description":"Your Fire-Type Moves Burn Targets on a roll of 19+. If a move already has a chance of Burning foes, Firebrand increases the effect range by +2.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack and Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fire Bringer, Adept Focus or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.73"}}

Broodlord.embed: {"title":"Broodlord","description":"You gain the following Ability based on your Embrace:","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enhanced Embrace Rank 2, Expert Command or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Arachnid\u2019s Embrace","value":" Tinted Lens"},{"name":"Monarch\u2019s Embrace","value":" Compound Eyes"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Glitch Burst.embed:
{"title":"Glitch Burst","description":"Glitch Burst's effect depends on the triggering Move.
»Disable
»Snatch
»Metronome
»Topsy-Turvy","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Shuffle, Master Perception, Occult Education, or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with Topsy-Turvy or use another Glitch Bender Move"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Scoundrel's Strike.embed: {"title":"Scoundrel's Strike","description":"The target loses Hit Points equal to your highest Rogue Skill Rank doubled, and an additional effect based on whether you have the Ambush or Cruelty Ability. You may use Scoundrel's Strike only once per Scene per target.\n\u00bb Ambush\n\u00bb Cruelty","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Underhanded Tactics, Street Fighter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Rogue Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Style Flourish.embed: {"title":"Style Flourish","description":"In Contests: Re-Roll all dice that result in 1s. This effect may only be used once per Contest.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Style Expert Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Poke\u0301mon uses a Move of your Chosen Type"},{"name":"In Battle","value":" The target gains +1 CS in the Stat corresponding to your chosen Contest Type, after the Move and all effects have been resolved.  is may only affect a target once per Scene."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.115"}}

Accessorize.embed: {"title":"Accessorize","description":"You may wear and benefit from two Accessory Slot Items at once. The two items must be of different types and must not share an effect. For example, a Fire Brace cannot be paired with another Fire Brace or a Fire Plate, but it could be paired with an Ice Brace, a Fire Booster, or a Stat Booster.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dashing Makeover, one Fashionista Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Cheerleader.embed: {"title":"Cheerleader","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Friend Guard Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Inspired Training, Novice Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.3"}}

Mobilize.embed: {"title":"Mobilize","description":"The target cannot provoke Attacks of Opportunity on their next turn. Mobilize may target an Ally only once per encounter.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Any Ally"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Genetic Memory.embed: {"title":"Genetic Memory","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns any Move from its Egg Move or Tutor Move List. Genetic Memory may target a Pok\u00e9mon only twice: once with a Tutor Move and once with an Egg Move. Egg Moves tutored this way do not count against the limit of 3 for TM and Tutor Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ancient Heritage, Expert Poke\u0301mon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Fossil Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.146"}}

Fan The Flames.embed: {"title":"Fan The Flames","description":"Instead of its usual range, the attack may be performed as if it had a range of Burst 1 if melee, or Cone 2 if ranged.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brightest Flame, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a 1-Target Fire-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Pact Gift - Lunar Dance.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Lunar Dance","description":"You learn the Move Lunar Dance.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Dreamspinner"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Mist Ball.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mist Ball","description":"You learn the Move Mist Ball.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Sight Sharing"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Kinjutsu.embed: {"title":"Kinjutsu","description":"You learn the Moves Substitute and Toxic.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Poison Weapons, Master Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Pusher.embed: {"title":"Pusher","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gain the Basic Ranged Attacks, Aura Pulse, Enticing Bait, Extended Invisibility, Far Reading, Precise Threadings, Seismometer, TK Mastery, and Trail Sniffer Poke Edges automatically if they qualify for them, without having to invest any Tutor Points.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Poke\u0301mon Caretaking Research Field, Novice Poke\u0301mon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.147"}}

Fighter's Versatility.embed: {"title":"Fighter's Versatility","description":"You may give up use of a Scene or Daily Move to regain use of a Scene or Daily Move which you have already used. You may give up use of a Daily Move to regain use of a Scene Move, but not vice-versa.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Any Stat]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Learned two Scene or Daily Moves"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You gain Initiative."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Steelheart.embed: {"title":"Steelheart","description":"When wielding metal Melee Weapons, you may use Athletics or Focus instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to qualify for a Weapon's Moves, and to resist Disarm Checks. Whenever your Weapon Attacks hit a foe who has previously hit you with a Melee attack in the same round, the foe loses a Tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Defense][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Steel), Novice Athletics, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Major Gift - Bad Dreams.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Bad Dreams","description":"You gain the Bad Dreams Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Oneiromancy, Major Gift - Dream Augury"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Metamagic.embed: {"title":"Metamagic","description":"You may apply a Rank 1 Power Manipulation to your attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Adept Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Special Move"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Major Gift - See the Wired.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - See the Wired","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next 5 minutes you can see networks as a visual overlay when you look at people communicating electronically. You view this in the form of lines of light arcing from devices to the other devices they are communicating with."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Intuitive Sabotage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.71"}}

Major Gift - Aqua Spirit.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Aqua Spirit","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, foes within 6 meters of you do not gain the benefits of Rain Dance. Their Water Type Moves do not deal extra damage, Hurricane and Thunder retain their usual Accuracy Check, Abilities based on Rainy Weather do not activate, and Moves such as Weather Ball do not gain added benefit. All detrimental effects of Rain Dance still apply."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Seamaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Martial Artist.embed: {"title":"Martial Artist","description":"Choose one of the abilities listed below. You gain the chosen Ability, and its associated tags. Whenever you gain any Martial Artist Feature, you also gain the associated tags.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Basic Martial Arts, Novice Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.161"}}

Burst of Speed.embed: {"title":"Burst of Speed","description":"Select an Initiative Count equal to half of your own Initiative or less; you may take an extra turn at that point in the round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"5 Tumbler Features, Master Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You end your turn"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Boo!.embed: {"title":"Boo!","description":"The next Ghost-Type attack the target makes that turn gains the Smite keyword and can't be Intercepted or avoided in any way (Dodge, Parry, Shield Moves, etc).","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon reappears after using Ghost Step, or the set-up phase of Phantom Force or Shadow Force"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Style is Eternal.embed: {"title":"Style is Eternal","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon instead retains their Held Item. Style is Eternal may only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is Disarmed or would have their Held Item removed by another effect such as Thief or Covet"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Desperate Strike.embed: {"title":"Desperate Strike","description":"Your Pokemon may apply the effects of Cruelty to the attack without expending Cruelty's Frequency. Cruelty's effects may be purchased as if the foe had additional injuries equal to the number of injuries on the user. Desperate Strike may be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Savage Strike, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon triggers Cruelty, or scores a Critical Hit with damaging attack."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.106"}}

Ancient Heritage.embed: {"title":"Ancient Heritage","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns Ancient Power. If the target has Ancient Power in its Level-Up List, Ancient Heritage costs no Tutor Points. As a static effect, whenever your Pok\u00e9mon use Ancient Power, its activated effect occurs on 18+ and you may always choose whether it deals Physical or Special Damage, using the appropriate attack Stat.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fossil Restoration"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Fossil Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.146"}}

Recoup Energy.embed: {"title":"Recoup Energy","description":"You do not expend the Frequency of the trig- gering Move. If you applied a Power Manipulation to the triggering Move, you are refunded the AP for the Manipulation or do not expend the Frequency for it.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Special Move misses all targets"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Haunted Wounds.embed: {"title":"Haunted Wounds","description":"After one full round, repeat the triggering attack against one target as a Free Action, regardless of range. If this attack hits, it deals damage as if it were resisted one step further. Haunted Wounds may only affect a target once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shadow Arms, Master Intimidate or Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with an Apparition Move or Ghost- Typed Weapon Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Grand Hex.embed: {"title":"Grand Hex","description":"Regain one use of a Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies that can inflict a Status Affliction that the triggering target has. If you activated the conditional damage boost for Hex, its Frequency is not expended. You may only activate Grand Hex once per target per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac Studies Rank 3, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with Hex"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Elite Trainer.embed: {"title":"Elite Trainer","description":"Choose Agility Training, Brutal Training, Focused Training, or Inspired Training. You gain the chosen Feature, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. When training, you may apply up to two different [Training] Features on each of your Pok\u00e9mon. If you already have all of these Features, instead pick another Feature for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

This Will Not Stand.embed: {"title":"This Will Not Stand","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains +1 Combat Stage in each of Attack, Special Attack, and Speed. This Will Not Stand may trigger only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tyrant\u2019s Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Dragon-Type Pok\u00e9mon takes a Critical Hit or Massive Damage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Shocking Speed.embed: {"title":"Shocking Speed","description":"You may activate this Feature to have your Electric-Type Pok\u00e9mon may use an Electric-Type Move with a Frequency of At-Will as if it had Priority (Advanced).","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lockdown, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Tough Tumble.embed: {"title":"Tough Tumble","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Tough Stat from Poffins may activate Tough Tumble as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert (Tough), Novice Intimidate"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1","value":" Scary Face, Spite"},{"name":"Rank 2","value":" Glare, Bide"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Climatology.embed: {"title":"Climatology","description":"You gain the Overcoat Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Climatology Research Field, Novice Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Haunting Curse.embed:
{"title":"Haunting Curse","description":"While this Feature is bound, the target gains a Curse Token each time they use a Ghost-Type Move or Ghost Step. Ghost-Type Moves with a Set-Up and Resolution Phase give a Curse Token for each Phase. As a Standard Action during their turn, or as Free Action upon Fainting, the target may spend their Curse Tokens to apply conditions to a foe within 6 meters.
» 1 Curse Token
» 2 Curse Tokens
» 3 Curse Tokens
» 4 Curse Tokens","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP — Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Fey Trance.embed: {"title":"Fey Trance","description":"While this Feature is bound, whenever the target uses a 1-Target Move with the Social Keyword or a Fairy-Type Status Move, the foe hit by the triggering Move becomes Infatuated with your Pokemon, and immediately Shifts towards your Pokemon, forfeiting their next Shift Action. This may affect a specific foe only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fairy Lights, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Chronicler.embed: {"title":"Chronicler","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2013 Swift Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon, Trainer, Move, or Location."}],"description":"You make Record of the target. Records can be placed in an Archive as an Extended Action. When you take Chronicler, you gain one Archive.\nFor more details, see```Chronicler Archive List```","footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

PK Alpha.embed: {"title":"PK Alpha","description":"You learn the Moves Kinesis and Barrier.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telekinetic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Null Error.embed: {"title":"Null Error","description":"You learn the Moves Disable and Snatch.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Maelstrom.embed: {"title":"Maelstrom","description":"You gain the Gilled Capability, and a +2 bonus to your Swim speed. Whenever your Water-Type Moves miss all targets, you gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Water), Novice Athletics, Novice Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Major Gift - Amorphous.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Amorphous","description":"You gain the Amorphous Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Alien Countenance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Major Gift - Life Force.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Life Force","description":"You gain the Life Force Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Two Major Gifts from the Tower Duo"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Quick Wit.embed: {"title":"Quick Wit","description":"You may make a Manipulate Maneuver or use a Social Move you know, Frequency allowing.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Provocateur, a Provocateur Skill at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.166"}}

Giftsapper.embed: {"title":"Giftsapper","description":"As long as Giftsapper\u2019s user is conscious, all Trainers within 10 meters must make a Focus Check with DC equal to three times the highest Skill Rank of Giftsaper's user between Focus, Intimidate, or Command in order to activate their Gifts. This Check is made each time a Trainer attempts to use an activated Gift, and a failure means neither any resources such as AP nor the frequency of the Gift is expended. For Gifts with Static or ongoing effects, the Check is made each turn, and a failure ends the effect for that turn. Giftsapper\u2019s user may never gain Gifts.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Any Stat]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission, No Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Target","value":"Self"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.54"}}

Magnetize.embed: {"title":"Magnetize","description":"You gain the Magnetic Capability and may use this magnetism to stick to surfaces with significant met- al content (ex: metal walls obviously, concrete with met- al I-beams inside, etc). You may use your Overland to traverse any such surfaces, even if that means walking vertically up a wall or upside down on a ceiling. You may choose not to be Pushed when on such a surface.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Storm Wizard Rank 1, Adept Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.69"}}

Tectonic Shift.embed: {"title":"Tectonic Shift","description":"Pick two of Earthquake, Earth Power, or Sand Tomb. You learn the chosen Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ground Out, Master Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.81"}}

Choreographer.embed: {"title":"Choreographer","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Point and learns a Dance Move created by yourself. Choreographer may target a Pok\u00e9mon multiple times.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Form; Adept Acrobatics, Athletics, or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Ghost Step.embed: {"title":"Ghost Step","description":"Your Ghost-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate this Feature by spending a Shift Action to remove themselves from the field. They may not be targeted in any way during this time. At the beginning of their next turn, they reappear in any square of their choice that they could have Shifted to from their previous location. Each Pok\u00e9mon may activate Ghost Step only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Ghost)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Dumplings.embed: {"title":"Dumplings","description":"Ingredient 1: Leftovers, Preserves, or a Snack made with Chef","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You mix the two ingredients into one Snack that has the same effect as its ingredients. The two ingredients must be different items."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Chef Features, Master Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Ingredient 2","value":" Leftovers or Preserves"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Sage.embed: {"title":"Sage","description":"The target gains Damage Reduction equal to your Occult Education Rank doubled or their Tick Value, whichever is higher, for one full round. Multiple uses of Sage from different Trainers do not stack on one target.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An ally within 5 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Telepath (Feature).embed: {"title":"Telepath (Feature)","description":"You gain the Telepathy Capability for the rest of the scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic), Iron Mind, Novice Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Resilience.embed: {"title":"Resilience","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon does not gain a Status Affliction, and the triggering attack does damage as if it was not a Critical Hit. Resilience may only be used once per target per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Awareness, Expert Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a Critical Hit or gains a Status Affliction (or both)"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Medic.embed: {"title":"Medic","description":"You are always considered to have access to a First Aid Manual and a Combat Medic's Primer, and are always considered to be Binding their Rank 1 Effects without actually using any AP.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Medic Training"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.6"}}

Earthroil.embed: {"title":"Earthroil","description":"Your Ground-Type Pok\u00e9mon may activate Earthroil as a Shift Action to use a damaging Ground- Type Move as it had a range of Line 4 or Burst 1 instead of its usual range, and as if it had the Groundsource keyword. 1-Target Moves performed this way take a -5 penalty to their Damage Rolls.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Enchanting Transformation.embed:
{"title":"Enchanting Transformation","description":"You perform a magical transformation on yourself. While this Feature is Bound, you gain +5 Damage Resistance against Dragon, Fighting, Dark, and Bug-Typed attacks and your Glamour Weaver Moves have the additional effects below.
» Sweet Kiss
» Dazzling Gleam
» Draining Kiss
» Moonblast
» Aromatic Mist","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glamour Weaver"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP — Shift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Shared Strengths.embed: {"title":"Shared Strengths","description":"","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Pokemon Form Level 20"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Pokemon Form Level 35"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" True Power, Pokemon Form Level 50"},{"name":"Rank 1 Effect","value":" You gain access to your Legendary Form\u2019s Abilities while in your Avatar form."},{"name":"Rank 2 Effect","value":" You gain your Legendary Form\u2019s Types while in your Avatar Form"},{"name":"Rank 3 Effect","value":" You gain access to your Legendary Form\u2019s Move List while in your Avatar Form."},{"name":"Note","value":" Your Legendary Form, by default, has access to all Capabilities, Abilities and Moves your Avatar does."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

Patch Cure.embed: {"title":"Patch Cure","description":"You distill the target, gaining 3 Restorative Patches. Restorative Patches have the same effect as the items from which they were created, but can only be applied as an Extended Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Apothecary, Adept Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Restorative Item"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.141"}}

Blur (Feature).embed: {"title":"Blur (Feature)","description":"Attacks and Moves targeting you that don't require an Accuracy Check now require one, as though they had Accuracy Check of 2. You may only apply half of your Evasion to these Attacks and Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Acrobatics, Expert Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Assault Armor.embed: {"title":"Assault Armor","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Damage Reduction against the attack equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Additionally, calculate Type Effectiveness with this attack as if your Pok\u00e9mon has no Typings besides Steel.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Polished Shine, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Steel-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a damaging attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Battle Synchronization.embed: {"title":"Battle Synchronization","description":"For one full round, whenever a Channeled Pok\u00e9mon successfully hits a foe, all Channeled Pok\u00e9mon \u00bb gain +1 Accuracy and +1 Evasion against that foe for the duration of this Feature.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.179"}}

Overgrowth.embed: {"title":"Overgrowth","description":"One target of the triggering Move is afflicted with Overgrowth. As long as the target is afflicted, they are one step less Resistant to Grass-Type attacks, to a maximum of neutral damage, and they cannot recover Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points. Whenever they would do so, you gain those Hit Points or Temporary Hit Points instead. Overgrowth is removed when the target Takes a Breather or is hit by a damaging Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, or Bug-Type attack. Overgrowth may only affect a target once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Nature's Embrace Rank 3"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a Druid Move"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

How To Shoot Web.embed: {"title":"How To Shoot Web","description":"You gain the Threaded and Wallclimber Capabilities.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Swarmlord"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Tremorsense.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Tremorsense","description":"You gain the Tremorsense Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Vulcan's Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Command Versatility.embed: {"title":"Command Versatility","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may give up use of a Scene or Daily Move to regain use of a Scene or Daily Move which it has already used. Your Pok\u00e9mon may give up use of a Daily Move to regain use of a Scene Move, but not vice-versa. You may use Command Versatility only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Command, Guile, or Pok\u00e9mon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon takes its turn"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Earthen Bond.embed: {"title":"Earthen Bond","description":"You gain the Tremorsense Capability, and you gain Naturewalk for Cave, Mountain and Desert.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Earth Shaker"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.81"}}

Malediction.embed: {"title":"Malediction","description":"Use a Status-Class Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies targeting the triggering foe as a Free Action, Frequency-permitting.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac Studies Rank 1, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"A foe within 5 meters misses all targets with an attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}
