Chemical Warfare.embed: {"title":"Chemical Warfare","description":"The Pester Ball creates a Blast 2, affecting all targets in the area.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chemist, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You throw a Pester Ball"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.144"}}

Major Gift - Lava-blooded.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Lava-blooded","description":"Static Effect: You are immune to the ambient heat of volcanic areas. Unless you come into direct contact with molten rock, you will not be harmed. You resist Fire Type Moves by one step.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Vulcan's Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static \/ Scene - Free Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene Effect"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Smith.embed: {"title":"Smith","description":"","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Novice Focus, Novice Athletics"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Focus, Adept Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Rank 1 Effect","value":" You may create Simple Weapons for $1000, Light Shields for $1,500, and Light Armor for $4,000."},{"name":"Rank 2 Effect","value":" You may create Fine Weapons for $2,000, Helmets for $1,125, Heavy Shields for $2,250 and Heavy Armor for $5,000."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.47"}}

Major Gift - Magic Bounce.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Magic Bounce","description":"You gain the Magic Bounce Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Royal Privilege"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Emergency Reactivation.embed: {"title":"Emergency Reactivation","description":"The triggering user does not suffer Augmenta- tion Shock and their Augmentations are not disabled. This Feature may affect a target only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Upgrader, Adept Technology Edu"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon suffer Augmentation Shock"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Major Gift - Sun Blanket.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sun Blanket","description":"You gain the Sun Blanket Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Major Gift - Shatter Memory.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Shatter Memory","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Choose an effect: The Target has one Ability disabled at random or two Moves disabled at random for the remainder of the Encounter. Additionally, the Target must make a Focus Check with DC 10 to recall complex thoughts and memories for the next fifteen minutes. The target becomes immune to further uses of Shatter Memory for 24 hours."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Fount of Knowledge"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"3 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Martial Achievement.embed: {"title":"Martial Achievement","description":"You gain a Martial Achievement based on your Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Martial Artist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

World of Darkness.embed: {"title":"World of Darkness","description":"You create a zone of Shifting Darkness in a Burst 2 around you, which persists until the end of the en- counter. All targets without Darkvision attacking from or i nto the Shifting Darkness receive a -3 penalty to Ac- curacy. You may count Shifting Darkness as complete darkness for the purposes of activating your Living Shadow. As a Static effect, you also gain the Darkvision Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller, Adept Guile or Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Highlander.embed: {"title":"Highlander","description":"While this Feature is Bound, the target gains X Damage Reduction against Dragon-Type attacks, and gain a +X Bonus to Damage Rolls with Dragon-Typed attacks against other Dragon-Typed targets. X is equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tyrant\u2019s Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Dragon-Type Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Archive Tutor.embed: {"title":"Archive Tutor","description":"Select a Record in your Technique Archive that is of a Move that the target can learn by Level Up, TM or by Move Tutor. The target learns the Move and loses 2 Tutor Points. You can target someone else's Pok\u00e9mon only once with Archive Tutor; you may target your own Pok\u00e9mon any number of times with Archive Tutor, but they must still abide by any Move Pool Limitations (ie: no more than 3 of the user's Move Pool can come from TMs or Tutor Moves).","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Technique Archive, Expert Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with 2 Tutor Points."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Apothecary.embed: {"title":"Apothecary","description":"You gain use of any Apothecary Recipe for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Apothecary Research Field, Novice Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.141"}}

Fortress.embed: {"title":"Fortress","description":"You Mark all targets of the attack until the end of your next turn. Marked foes take a penalty to Attack Rolls against any targets besides you equal to your Focus Rank. A Mark from a different source (such as a second Fortress or a Fighting Type Ace's Pok\u00e9mon) will overwrite your Mark.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Defense][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"You target an enemy with a Struggle attack or Weapon Attack and end your turn adjacent to the target."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Passionato Harmony.embed: {"title":"Passionato Harmony","description":"You learn the Moves Dazzling Gleam and Draining Kiss.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glamour Weaver, Expert Charm or Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Fight On and On.embed: {"title":"Fight On and On","description":"You are not Fainted; you instead Faint upon reaching -50% of your Max Hit Points. If you have 5 or more injuries, you may use this Feature regardless of Frequency.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lessons in Rage and Pain, Adept Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Hit Points are lowered to or below 0 while Enraged."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Pact Gift - Ghost in the Machine.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Ghost in the Machine","description":"You gain the Wired capability. Electronics you are occupying gradually degrade and begin to malfunction over time.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All MissingNo Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.71"}}

Breadth of Knowledge.embed: {"title":"Breadth of Knowledge","description":"You gain three Skill Edges for which you qualify. These Edges must be used to gain a Skill Edge with an Education Skill, or to gain an Edge that has an Education Skill as a Prerequisite that you meet.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"General Research Field, Novice General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.7"}}

Power of Rage.embed: {"title":"Power of Rage","description":"Choose Enduring Rage, or White Flame. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Berserker"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Arcane Favor.embed: {"title":"Arcane Favor","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon and all allies on the Field gain a +1 Bonus to all rolls for one full round.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fairy Lights, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Fairy-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Ravager Orders.embed: {"title":"Ravager Orders","description":"You gain the Reckless Advance and Strike Again! Orders.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Command or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.61"}}

Pact Gift - Water Spout.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Water Spout","description":"You learn the Move Water Spout.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Kyogre Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Mold the Earth.embed: {"title":"Mold the Earth","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use the Groundshaper Capability as a Free Action. When used this way, Groundshaper creates Spike Hazards in each square turned into Rough or Slow Terrain. If you wish, instead of Groundshaper's normal range, you may choose to affect the square targeted by the attack and all cardinally adjacent squares. If the triggering Move is a Burst, Blast, Line, or Cone, you may choose to affect all squares in the targeted area instead.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Ground)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with the Groundshaper Capability uses a Ground-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

PK Omega.embed: {"title":"PK Omega","description":"You learn the Moves Telekinesis and Psychic.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"PK Alpha, Expert Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Reactive Armour.embed: {"title":"Reactive Armour","description":"All foes within a Burst 1 lose Hit Points equal to double your Athletics or Focus Rank, and you gain Damage Reduction equal to double your Athletics or Focus Rank for one full round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Adept Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You gain an Injury or take a Critical Hit while wearing metallic Armor"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Crash and Smash.embed: {"title":"Crash and Smash","description":"You learn the Moves Double Edge and Thrash. You may use these moves as a Weapon Attack when wielding Melee Weapons.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frenzy, Expert Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Corrosive Blight.embed: {"title":"Corrosive Blight","description":"The target gains the Blight Condition for one full round. Blighted targets lose a Tick of Hit Points upon being hit by any attack. If the attack is Poison-Typed, the Blight effect's duration is refreshed.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Potent Venom, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe with a Poison-Type Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Accentuated Taste.embed:
{"title":"Accentuated Taste","description":"Whenever you create a Snack with a Chef Feature, you may assign it a Taste chosen from Salty, Sour, Spicy, Dry, and Sweet. Tasty Snacks must be assigned their corresponding Taste. Whenever a Pokémon trades in a Digestion Buff from a Snack with an assigned Taste they do not dislike, they gain the following bonuses:
» Salty
» Spicy
» Sour
» Dry
» Bitter","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef, Adept Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Sweet","value":" Increase the user's Initiative by 5."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Vile Body.embed: {"title":"Vile Body","description":"Choose Absorb Force, Poison Point, or Poison Touch. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasmic, Adept Guile or Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Pact Gift - Blue Flare.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Blue Flare","description":"You learn the Move Blue Flare.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Reshiram and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Staying Power.embed: {"title":"Staying Power","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may \"Take a Breather\" even if it is Confused or Enraged, and it does not Trip or have to Shift away from enemies as part of the action. You may choose whether or not your Pok\u00e9mon resets their Combat Stages to default.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enduring Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon Takes a Breather"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Pack Master.embed: {"title":"Pack Master","description":"For you and your Pok\u00e9mon with Teamwork, Teamwork's effect now reads \"While you are adjacent to an opponent, allies targeting that opponent receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy Checks\". Whenever you or your Pok\u00e9mon successfully hit a foe with Pack Hunt, they gain a +2 Bonus to Accuracy Rolls and a +5 Bonus to Damage Rolls against that foe until the end of their next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pack Tactics, Expert Stealth, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Coordinator.embed: {"title":"Coordinator","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may reroll a single Appeal Roll or Damage Roll. This Feature may be used only once per Contest, and once per Pok\u00e9mon per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Grace, Novice Charm, Command, Guile, Intimidate, or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.83"}}

Guidance.embed: {"title":"Guidance","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon's base Move List Limit is increased by +1 (Reminder: The default Move List Limit is 6).","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Type Refresh.embed: {"title":"Type Refresh","description":"The target regains one use of a Scene-Frequency Move of your Chosen Type, and refreshes the Frequency of all EOT-Frequency Moves of your Chosen Type. A Target can be affected by Type Refresh only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.119"}}

Conqueror's March.embed: {"title":"Conqueror's March","description":"This round, if being used as a Mount, the target may use Dash, Burst, Blast, Cone, or Line range Moves with a range of Pass instead of their usual range.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ramming Speed, Adept Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with Run Up"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Gale Speed.embed: {"title":"Gale Speed","description":"Choose Celebrate or Gale Wings. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Raging Winds Rank 1, Master Acrobatics or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.75"}}

Shade Caller.embed: {"title":"Shade Caller","description":"You learn the Moves Faint Attack and Snarl.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Dark), Novice Guile, Novice Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Shield Bearer.embed: {"title":"Shield Bearer","description":"You may immediately ready a Shield, and do not become Slowed as a result. You may choose to grant an adjacent Ally the Evasion and Damage Reduction bonuses from your shield instead of gaining them yourself, but these bonuses only apply as long as the ally remains adjacent to you. If you do and the ally Shifts, you may Shift alongside your ally as a Shift Action Interrupt. This cannot cause you to shift more than your normal Movement.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stalwart Bastion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Miasma Unleashed.embed: {"title":"Miasma Unleashed","description":"You learn the moves Sludge Wave and Toxic.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasma\u2019s Call, Master Stealth or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Glitch Bender.embed: {"title":"Glitch Bender","description":"You gain the Synchronize Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitched Existence, Novice Focus, Occult Education, or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Major Gift - Mind Lock.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mind Lock","description":"You gain the Mind Lock Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Alien Countenance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Let's Be Friends!.embed: {"title":"Let's Be Friends!","description":"The target may attempt to improve the disposition of a Wild Pok\u00e9mon as if making a Charm Check. They roll their Cute Dice from Poffins and add their number of Cute Dice from Stats as a modifier. For example, a Pok\u00e9mon with 4d6 Cute from Poffins and 3d6 Cute from Speed rolls 4d6+3 in place of a Charm Check","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cute Cuddle Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Divination.embed: {"title":"Divination","description":"You may perform an Augury or Scrying.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Oracle"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Face Me Whelp.embed: {"title":"Face Me Whelp","description":"While your Pok\u00e9mon is adjacent to a foe they Marked, that foe gains a -X penalty to Accuracy Rolls and a -10 penalty to Damage Rolls on attacks that do not target the Pok\u00e9mon that Marked them. X is equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Close Quarters Mastery, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Major Gift - Drizzle.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Drizzle","description":"You gain the Drizzle Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Seamaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Green Path.embed: {"title":"Green Path","description":"You gain the Naturewalk (Grassland) and Naturewalk (Forest) capabilities, and you are immune to Moves with the Powder keyword.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Druid"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

Major Gift - Aura Break.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Aura Break","description":"You gain the Aura Break Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 World Serpent\u2019s Embrace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Endurance.embed: {"title":"Endurance","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon can ignore up to X meters of falling when calculating falling damage, act without beginning to suffocate for X additional rounds, or ignore the Hit Point loss effects from acting while Heavily Injured for X rounds. X is equal to half its number of Tough Dice from Poffins.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tough Tumble Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon takes falling damage, begins to suffocate, or is Heavily Injured."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Cavalier's Reprisal.embed: {"title":"Cavalier's Reprisal","description":"You may make a Struggle Attack against the triggering foe.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ride as One, Expert Acrobatics or Athletics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"An adjacent foe hits your Mount with an attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Major Gift - Barrier.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Barrier","description":"You learn the Move Barrier.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Motherly Compassion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Vim and Vigor.embed: {"title":"Vim and Vigor","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Vigor Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shrug Off, Master Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.99"}}

Second Strike.embed: {"title":"Second Strike","description":"You may immediately use Rock Smash or a Struggle Attack against your target as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Martial Artist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You attempt to use a Grapple, Push, Trip, or Disarm Combat Maneuver but fail the Opposed Roll"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.162"}}

Immutable Mind.embed: {"title":"Immutable Mind","description":"If the triggering Move was a Status-Class Move, the Move fails. If the Triggering Move was a Damaging Move with a Secondary Effect that triggers on a certain roll, you are immune to the secondary effect.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mental Resistance, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You're hit by a Psychic, Ghost, or Dark-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Unexpected Attacks.embed: {"title":"Unexpected Attacks","description":"You learn the Moves Pursuit and Sucker Punch.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue, two Rogue Skills at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Major Gift - White Yang.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - White Yang","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"All allies within 5 meters may choose to increase all movement speeds by 2, raise their Attack and Special Attack Stats by 1 Combat Stage, and decrease their Accuracy by 2 for the next three rounds."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hero of Truth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Major Gift - The Empty Tao.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - The Empty Tao","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, all Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers within 5 meters of you have all Combat Stages locked to zero."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hero of Balance"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Finisher.embed: {"title":"Finisher","description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon gain a +5 bonus to Damage Rolls against Fainted, Flinched, Sleeping, Stuck, Slowed, Trapped, or Tripped targets.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hunter, Adept Stealth, Adept Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Flexible Form.embed: {"title":"Flexible Form","description":"Your body becomes more malleable, and even your bones are able to flex when required. You do not gain Injuries from taking Massive damage, and you gain a +2 Bonus to any Acrobatics or Athletics Check made to bend, squeeze, or otherwise contort your body -in- cluding those to avoid Trip or Grapple maneuvers.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasmic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Skirmisher.embed: {"title":"Skirmisher","description":"Choose Flutter or Vanguard. You gain the Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.61"}}

Call the Dragon's Rage.embed: {"title":"Call the Dragon's Rage","description":"Your learn the Moves Dragon Claw and Dragon Tail. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Bare the Dragon\u2019s Claws, Master Com- mand or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.67"}}

Symbolsight.embed: {"title":"Symbolsight","description":"For the next ten minutes, you see the world through the lens of Symbolsight. You may end this effect early as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static | 1 AP - Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Self"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static Effect"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.54"}}

Lessons.embed: {"title":"Lessons","description":"You may perform any Mentor Lesson for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Underhanded Tactics.embed: {"title":"Underhanded Tactics","description":"You gain your choice of Ambush or Cruelty.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rogue, a Rogue Skill at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Brutal Training.embed: {"title":"Brutal Training","description":"The target becomes Brutal until the end of the effect duration. Brutal Pok\u00e9mon increase the Critical- Hit and Effect Range of all attacks by +1.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Intimidate, Untrained Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Prismatic Alignment.embed:
{"title":"Prismatic Alignment","description":"The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move. You may only use Prismatic Alignment with each Move once per Scene.
»Flash
»Swift
»Tri Attack
»Weather Ball
»Hyper Beam
»Morning Sun","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Prism Features, Master Charm or General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Prism Move"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.85"}}

Dead-Eye Shot.embed: {"title":"Dead-Eye Shot","description":"Use of Dead-Eye Shot must be declared at the start of the round. Nothings happens at this time. At the end of the round, the user may use their Shift Action, and then make a Ranged Weapon Attack and roll twice for Accuracy. You may resolve the attack using either result, but if you choose to use the lower result and the attack hits, it is automatically a Critical Hit.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman, Master Combat or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Standard, Priority"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Aura Mastery.embed: {"title":"Aura Mastery","description":"Choose two of Aura Sphere, Focus Blast, Drain Punch, or Focus Punch. You learn the chosen Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Guardian, Expert Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Survivalist.embed: {"title":"Survivalist","description":"Choose a Terrain in which you have spent at least three nights. You gain Naturewalk for that terrain and a +2 bonus to Athletics, Acrobatics, Stealth, Perception, and Survival Checks in that terrain. When you have 2 Sur- vivalist Features, you may choose a second Terrain. When you have 4 Survivalist Features, you may choose a third terrain. When you have 6 Survivalist Features, you may choose a fourth terrain.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.149"}}

Fossil Restoration.embed: {"title":"Fossil Restoration","description":"The resulting Pok\u00e9mon is born with 2 fewer Tutor Points, and gains its second Basic Ability. If it has only has one Basic Ability, it gains one of its Advanced Abilities, chosen by the GM. This Feature does not affect how the Pok\u00e9mon continues to gain Abilities.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Paleontology Research Field, Paleontologist, Novice Poke\u0301mon Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Fossil you are reviving"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.146"}}

Miasmic.embed: {"title":"Miasmic","description":"You learn the Moves Acid and Clear Smog.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Poison), Novice Stealth, Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Fiery Soul.embed: {"title":"Fiery Soul","description":"You gain the Heater Capability, and are immune to the Burn condition.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack and Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fire Bringer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.73"}}

Terrain Talent.embed: {"title":"Terrain Talent","description":"Each Rank, you gain two Terrain Talents, chosen from the Terrains for which you gained Naturewalk from Survivalist.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+HP]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist, 2 Mastered Terrains"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Survivalist, 4 Mastered Terrains"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.150"}}

Lockdown.embed: {"title":"Lockdown","description":"For 1 full round, that foe is instead Stuck and may only use At-Will Frequency Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Electric)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon's Damaging Electric Attack would inflict Paralysis on an already Paralyzed foe"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Warping Ground.embed: {"title":"Warping Ground","description":"You learn the Moves Gravity and Trick.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warper"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Pact Gift - Hyper Beam.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Hyper Beam","description":"You learn the Move Hyper Beam.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Rayquaza Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Pact Gift - V-Create.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - V-Create","description":"You learn the Move V-Create.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Victini Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Smart Scheme.embed: {"title":"Smart Scheme","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3d6 in their Smart Stat from Poffins may activate Smart Scheme as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Style Expert (Smart), Novice Guile"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Rank 1","value":" Fake Tears, Calm Mind"},{"name":"Rank 2","value":" Taunt, Flatter"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.117"}}

Case Specialist.embed:
{"title":"Case Specialist","description":"The Case has additional effects according to its type(s).
»Spray Case
»Flash Case
»Bounce Case
»Zap Case","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Jailbreaker, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a target with a Poké Ball with a Spray, Flash, Bounce, or Zap Case applied to it."}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.82"}}

Major Gift - Time Stop.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Time Stop","description":"Take an additional Shift Action and Standard Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Realm Portal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Swift Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Enduring Bloom.embed: {"title":"Enduring Bloom","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank, and gains +1 Combat Stage in the Stat of your choice. If it is Sunny, they may gain +1 Combat Stage in a second, different Stat. You may activate Enduring Bloom only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Foiling Foliage, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Grass-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a damaging Bug, Fire, Flying, Ice, or Poison attack that deals Super- Effective Damage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

Miasmic Spray.embed:
{"title":"Miasmic Spray","description":"The Effect of this feature depends on the triggering move.
»Acid
»Clear Smog
»Sludge Bomb
»Sludge Wave
»Toxic
»Acid Armor","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasma’s Call, Master Stealth or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with Acid, Clear Smog, Sludge Bomb, Sludge Wave, or Toxic; or use Acid Armor."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Vampirism.embed: {"title":"Vampirism","description":"Choose a Stat. The triggering foe loses a Tick of Hit Points and a Combat Stage in that Stat. Your Pok\u00e9mon gains 1 Combat Stage in the chosen Stat, and a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ghost Step, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits an adjacent foe with a Ghost-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.124"}}

This One's Special, I Know It.embed: {"title":"This One's Special, I Know It","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon is born with special qualities, determined by the GM. This Feature may be activated one time per Pok\u00e9mon Education Rank above Untrained.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pusher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Special \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A hatching egg."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.147"}}

Dance Practice.embed: {"title":"Dance Practice","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains your choice of Spinning Dance or Own Tempo. Press.embed: {"title":"Press","description":"You hit your Pok\u00e9mon, and they lose 1\/6th of their Max Hit Points and are cured of Sleep. Using Press on a Pok\u00e9mon may make them dislike you.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your own Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Berserker.embed: {"title":"Berserker","description":"You learn the Moves Rage and Flail. You may use these moves as a Weapon Attack when wielding Melee Weapons.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

{"title":"Flip Out","description":"Your Tumbler Moves gain additional effects.

Major Gift - Animate.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Animate","description":"Target: Materials","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Create a small golem out of the inanimate material of your choice. The material used will determine the Type of the golem. Scrap metal may create a Steel type, lava a Fire type, and granite a Rock type, for example. Distribute a number of Stat Points to the golem equal to your Trainer Level. The golem is small size, weight class 1, and has Overland 4, Jump 0\/0, and Power 2. It can make Struggle Attacks of its Type. The golem must be verbally commanded by you to act. It cannot regain HP and is destroyed upon Fainting. At the end of the day or if you Faint, the golem crumbles and is destroyed."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Unveiled Sight.embed: {"title":"Unveiled Sight","description":"You can see through Illusions. As a Standard Action, you can create a Burst 4, dispelling all Illusion effects within.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Oracle"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Stone Stance.embed:
{"title":"Stone Stance","description":"You adopt one of the stances below, gaining the effects of the stance while this Feature remains bound. You may switch your active Stance as a Standard Action without rebinding your AP. The benefits from this Feature do not apply if you are not standing on a solid surface, such as deep mud or snow, or if you are outright swimming or even flying.
»Falling Boulder Stance
»Moon Mountain Stance
»Roiling Earth Stance","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stone Warrior"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP — Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Usurper.embed: {"title":"Usurper","description":"Your human form is now considered your Avatar, and you gain a second set of stats for your Poke\u0301mon form. This form is that of the Legendary you usurped, starts at level 1 with the nature and abilities of your choice, and may gain experience as if it were a Poke\u0301mon you owned. Switching between your human form and this one takes a Standard Action. Usurpers cannot receive Gifts or Blessings from other Legendaries, as they are divinity themselves now. Any Touched, Branded, Messiah, and Signer Edges and Features you possessed up until this point are refunded. The Patron Stats for this Feature and all other Usurper Features matches the stats of the Legendary you Usurped.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"You have slain a God and through occult ritual or technology have absorbed its essence."},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

You must meet a Move's Prerequisites to choose that Move.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Martial Artist"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Martial Artist, Expert Combat"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Martial Artist, Master Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.161"}}

Inspirational Support.embed: {"title":"Inspirational Support","description":"Whenever your Pok\u00e9mon with Friend Guard targets an Ally with an Ability or Status Move, the targeted Ally becomes Cheered.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cheers, Adept Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.3"}}

Glamour Weaver.embed: {"title":"Glamour Weaver","description":"You learn the Moves Sweet Kiss and Disarming Voice.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Fairy), Novice Charm, Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Overwatch.embed: {"title":"Overwatch","description":"Create a Line X, and place a Blast 3 with at least three meters overlapping the Line's area. X is equal to your Weapon's Range. For one full round, if a foe moves in or out of that area, you may make a Ranged Weapon attack, Frequency allowing, against that foe as a Free Ac- tion. You may not attack a specific foe more than once per round this way. While this is in effect, if you Move from your current location, Overwatch's effect is lost.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman, Adept Perception or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Glacial Defense.embed: {"title":"Glacial Defense","description":"Choose Ice Shield or Winter's Kiss. You gain the Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Gift of Power.embed: {"title":"Gift of Power","description":"You gift your target with a Blessing of your own. Whether this makes them Touched, a Signer, or Branded is at your digression. The actual Blessings may not need be the one listed here for your Legendary Form, but ones of your own creation at your GM\u2019s discretion.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pokemon Form Level 60"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Trainer"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

Overclock.embed: {"title":"Overclock","description":"The target is cured of all Persistent Statuses, resets all negative Combat Stages to default, and gains two Ticks of Temporary Hit Points. For the rest of the Scene, it deals and takes additional damage with all attacks equal to your Technology Education Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Engineer, Expert Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9bot"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Major Gift - Tower's Blessing.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Tower's Blessing","description":"Trigger: You or your Pok\u00e9mon use a Move with the Blessing Keyword","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"The Move generates one additional use of the Blessing."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Tower\u2019s Rejuvenation"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Godslayer.embed: {"title":"Godslayer","description":"You may attempt to shatter one of the target\u2019s Legendary Auras. The AC of this action is 10. If you successfully disabled the Aura, but rolled a 10-15, the feedback from the action gives you an Injury.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Standard Action \u2013 EOT"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Legendary Pok\u00e9mon."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.54"}}

Ramming Speed.embed: {"title":"Ramming Speed","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Run Up Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rider"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}, {"name":"Note","value":"Run Up is no longer available as a normal Ability, but this feature still grants the effect as an Ability. As such, it is not available for normal lookup, but is presented here instead."}, {"name":"Run Up", "value":"Static\nIf the user moves in a straight line to a target and uses a damaging Melee Attack, it may add the number of meters traveled in a direct line as Bonus Damage to a Damage Roll.\nCore: p.328"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.103"}}

Street Fighter.embed: {"title":"Street Fighter","description":"You learn the Moves Assurance and Payback.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Unexpected Attacks, two Rogue Skills at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.169"}}

Quick Healing.embed: {"title":"Quick Healing","description":"Your Hardened Pok\u00e9mon may use Quick Healing to remove up to three injuries, and gains two Ticks of Hit Points for each Injury removed this way.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Taskmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Shards of Stone.embed: {"title":"Shards of Stone","description":"You learn the Moves Rock Slide and Stealth Rock","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stone Warrior, Expert Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Insectoid Utility.embed:
{"title":"Insectoid Utility","description":"Your Pokémon with the following Capabilities have the upgrades below applied to them.
» Threaded
» Wallclimber
» Naturewalk","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Bug)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Sky","value":" Your Pokémon has a +1 bonus to its Speed Evasion."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Branded.embed: {"title":"Branded","description":"You have made a contract with a deity or other supernatural being and have been Branded for it. This Brand may or may not be of your choosing. The other party will uphold their side of the deal and expects you to do the same. Other Legendaries may be wary to grant you Gifts in the future based on the contents of this contract. Your Patron Stats for this feature are those of the being you made your contract with. If this being was not a typical Legendary, its Patron Stats are its two highest base stats.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.50"}}

Major Gift - Water Absorb.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Water Absorb","description":"You gain the Water Absorb Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Pact Gift - Geomancy.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Geomancy","description":"You learn the Move Geomancy.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Xerneas Major Gifts and Shared Mortality Duo Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Pact Gift - Slayer of the False Gods.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Slayer of the False Gods","description":"Target: Legendary Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Dispel one of the target\u2019s Legendary Auras for the rest of the encounter."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All MissingNo Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Miasma.embed: {"title":"Miasma","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may use either Smokescreen or Poison Gas as if they were on their Move List. When used this way, these Moves ignore Frequency Limitations, and are used as a Ranged Blast 3, with the blast centered on the square targeted by the triggering attack. Poison-Type Pok\u00e9mon are not negatively affected by Smoke Screens created this way. Your Pok\u00e9mon may also trigger Miasma deliberately as a Standard Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Potent Venom, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon misses with a Poison-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Musical Ability.embed: {"title":"Musical Ability","description":"Choose Drown Out or Soundproof. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Musician"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Leadership.embed: {"title":"Leadership","description":"You may use [Orders] that have targets to target any Ally, even if normally those [Orders] would only let you apply the effect to your own Pokemon. Any other conditions still apply.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Iterative Evolution.embed: {"title":"Iterative Evolution","description":"While this Feature is bound, if your Pok\u00e9mon's Bug-Type attack would deal Super-Effective Damage, it gains a +2 Bonus to Accuracy Check. If it would deal Neutral Damage, it gains a Bonus to its Damage Roll equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. If it would be resisted, it is resisted one step less. This is calculated after applying any other effects that would modify effectiveness before the Accuracy Roll is made, such as the Tinted Lens Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Insectoid Utility, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Luminous Aura.embed: {"title":"Luminous Aura","description":"Choose Starlight or Sunglow. You gain the Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Blinding Brightness, Adept Charm or General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.85"}}

Passing Waltz.embed: {"title":"Passing Waltz","description":"Choose an ally within 3 meters of the triggering target. That ally gains Combat Stages from the triggering Move instead of the user.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Practice; Master Acrobatics, Athletics, or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or one of your Pok\u00e9mon with Own Tempo or Spinning Dance uses a Dance Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Major Gift - Clear Body.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Clear Body","description":"You gain the Clear Body Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Mark of Loyalty"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Major Gift - Luster Purge.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Luster Purge","description":"You learn the Move Luster Purge.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Sight Sharing"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Power of the Mind.embed: {"title":"Power of the Mind","description":"Choose Interference or Levitate. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telekinetic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Major Gift - Volt Absorb.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Volt Absorb","description":"You gain the Volt Absorb Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Dilettante.embed: {"title":"Dilettante","description":"Each Rank of Dilettante, you gain both an Edge and a General Feature from the lists below. You may gain the chosen Edge and Feature even if you do not meet the Skill prerequisites. You must meet any other Prerequisites. Whenever you gain a Feature or Edge this way, change any Skill Rank applications or Skill Checks mandated directly by the Edge or Feature into your choice of General Education or Perception Skill Checks or Rank applications instead.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4]"},{"name":"All Ranks Prerequisites","value":"Hobbyist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.86"}}

Juggling Show.embed: {"title":"Juggling Show","description":"You may roll an additional Xd6 during the In- troduction Stage of a Contest, where X is half of your Acrobatics Rank. You may choose any Contest Stat to attempt to gain Dice for with this roll.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway.embed: {"title":"The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway","description":"You gain the Naturewalk (Tundra) Capability, are immune to being Frozen, and do not lose Hit Points from Hail.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Pack Tactics.embed: {"title":"Pack Tactics","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Pack Hunt or Teamwork Ability. You may target a Pok\u00e9mon with Pack Tactics only once.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Hunter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Sleight.embed: {"title":"Sleight","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may activate Sleight as an Interrupt to immediately take their turn and use a Status- Class Move as a Standard Action. If this Move targets a foe, it ignores Substitute and Defensive Abilities, and Blessings may not be activated against the Move.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Trickster Features, Master Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Major Gift - Earthshaker.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Earthshaker","description":"You gain the Groundshaper Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Landmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Utility Drop.embed: {"title":"Utility Drop","description":"You may use a Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops as a Free action during your Shift. Instead of the Move's usual area of effect, you leave one square of Smokescreen, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes on each square you leave as you Shift. Once you place 8 meters of Smoke, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes you may not place any more.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja\u2019s Arsenal, Expert Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You Shift"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Stacked Deck.embed: {"title":"Stacked Deck","description":"Choose a Status Affliction or condition the triggering target is suffering from; the target suffers an additional effect according to the table below. Stacked Deck may only affect a foe once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Trickster, Adept Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe suffering from a Status Affliction or one of the other conditions in the table below"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Duelist's Manual.embed:
{"title":"Duelist's Manual","description":"Apply one of the following effects. To choose an effect, your Pokémon must have a certain amount of Momentum. (Duelist's Manual does not spend Momentum).
» 1 Momentum
» 2 Momentum
» 3 Momentum","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expend Momentum, Effective Methods, Expert Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP — Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon under the effects of Focused Training"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.97"}}

Gleeful Steps.embed: {"title":"Gleeful Steps","description":"In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cute Cuddle Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Cute-Type Move"},{"name":"In Battles","value":" In Battles"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.116"}}

Gotta Catch 'Em All.embed: {"title":"Gotta Catch 'Em All","description":"Every time you Capture a Wild Pok\u00e9mon that is a member of an evolutionary family of which you own no other Pok\u00e9mon, you gain 1 Collector Stack. Whenever you make a Capture Roll, you may spend up to three Collector Stacks to gain an equal bonus to your Capture Roll, or you may spend three Collector Stacks to re-roll entirely.","fields":[{"name":"Class","value":"Capture Specialist"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Advanced Capture Techniques Rank 3"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.8"}}

Magical Burst.embed: {"title":"Magical Burst","description":"Use a Glamour Weaver Move as if it had the range Burst 3, Friendly, Exhaust, Smite. All allies within the area-of-effect gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points or cure themselves of one Volatile Affliction. Enchanting Transformation immediately becomes Unbound, and the AP used to bind it becomes spent instead of becoming available again.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enchanting Transformation, Passionato Harmony"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You must have Enchanting Transformation Bound to use Magical Burst"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Glitch Shuffle.embed: {"title":"Glitch Shuffle","description":"You learn the Moves Metronome and Topsy- Turvy","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glitch Bender, Expert Perception, Occult Education, or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Winter is Coming.embed: {"title":"Winter is Coming","description":"You gain the Frostbite Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched, Master Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Major Gift - Blaze Armor.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Blaze Armor","description":"You take damage from the next Attack that hits you as if you were Fire Type. If the Attack was made in melee range, your attacker loses 1\/8th of their maximum HP as a Fire Type effect. Apply weakness and resistance. Do not apply stats.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Chosen of Victory"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Free Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}

Dancer (Feature).embed: {"title":"Dancer","description":"Choose Spinning Dance or Own Tempo. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Acrobatics; Novice Athletics or Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Fairy Lights.embed: {"title":"Fairy Lights","description":"Your Fairy-Type Pokemon may activate Fairy Lights as a Standard Action to create 3 Fairy Lights that hover around themselves. Whenever the target is attacked by a foe within 6 meters, they may expend a Fairy Light to either immediately gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points, or to use the Move Fairy Wind as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Fairy)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Special","value":"Fairy Lights also provide mild lighting, comparable to a candle. As an extended action your Pokemon can control the lights individually, but they must stay within 6 meters of the Pokemon that created them."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.122"}}

Ace Trainer.embed: {"title":"Ace Trainer","description":"For each Pok\u00e9mon that has been Trained during this time, choose a Stat besides HP; that Stat becomes Trained until an Extended Rest is taken. The default State of Trained Stats is +1 Combat Stages instead of 0. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Trained Stat at a time.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Drain 1 AP \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You spend at least half an hour Training your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Inspired Training.embed: {"title":"Inspired Training","description":"The target becomes Inspired until the end of the effect duration. Inspired Pok\u00e9mon gain a +1 bonus to Evasion and +2 to Save Checks.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Charm, Untrained Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Chain Lightning.embed: {"title":"Chain Lightning","description":"Pick another Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 3 meters of the target of the attack. You may repeat the triggering attack against the target, with a -5 Damage penalty. If you hit, you may repeat the attack a third time against a foe within 3 meters of the second target, this time with a -10 Damage penalty. The third target cannot be the same as the original target.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lockdown, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging 1-target Electric Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Force of Will.embed: {"title":"Force of Will","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately use another Psychic-Type Status Move from its Move List with a range of Blessing, Field, Hazard, or Self.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Psionic Sponge, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Psychic-Type Status Move with a range of Blessing, Field, Hazard, or Self."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.127"}}

Aura Reader (Feature).embed: {"title":"Aura Reader (Feature)","description":"You gain the Aura Reader Capability for the rest of the scene. If your Intuition is Adept Rank or higher, you also gain the Aura Pulse Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Guardian"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Thought Detection.embed: {"title":"Thought Detection","description":"You become aware of the number of living Humans or Pok\u00e9mon within X meters of yourself; X is equal to your Focus Rank tripled. Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers with the Mindlock Capability are not detected by this Ability. You may only use Thought Detection as long as you have the Telepathy Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepathic Awareness"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Major Gift - Teravolt.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Teravolt","description":"You gain the Teravolt Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Black Yin"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Backpacker.embed: {"title":"Backpacker","description":"You gain the Skill Enhancement Edge. You then gain an instance of the Skill Stunt Edge for each of the two Skills you chose with Skill Enhancement.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Traveler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.3"}}

Moment of Action.embed: {"title":"Moment of Action","description":"Each target gains 1 Temporary Action Point. These Action Points disappear after one full Round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Cheerleader"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Up to two Allied Trainers"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.3"}}

Hero's Journey.embed: {"title":"Hero's Journey","description":"Each Rank, you may gain two Backpacker Talents for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Backpacker"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Survival"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.3"}}

Winter's Herald.embed: {"title":"Winter's Herald","description":"You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Rank of Winter's Herald you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Frost Touched, Expert Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Master Athletics or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Soul Investment.embed: {"title":"Soul Investment","description":"Choose one Novice and one Expert Arcane Weapon Move. Your Soul Bonded Weapon adds those Moves to your Move List as long as this Feature is Bound. You may only Bind one instance of this Feature at a time, and you may not have multiple instances of the same Move in your Move List.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Soul Bonded Weapon"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Frenzy.embed: {"title":"Frenzy","description":"You may immediately take your turn with Priority. If you do, you are instantly cured of Slowed and Stuck, and for the rest of this turn gain a +2 Bonus to Critical Hit Range, +2 Bonus to Movement Speed, and +2 Bonus to Acrobatics, Athletics, Combat, and Intimidate Checks.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Berserker, Adept Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You must currently be Enraged to use this Feature Effect"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.49"}}

Swift Strikes.embed: {"title":"Swift Strikes","description":"Use a Weapon Attack as if it had the Priority Key- word. If the Move already had the Priority Keyword, use it as if it had the Priority (Advanced) Keyword instead.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"4 Skirmisher Features, Master Combat or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Standard Action, Special"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.61"}}

Storm Wizard.embed: {"title":"Storm Wizard","description":"You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Storm Wizard Rank you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Spark Master"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Acrobatics or Focus"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Master Acrobatics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.69"}}

Efficient Installation.embed: {"title":"Efficient Installation","description":"You and your Pok\u00e9mon gain a +2 boost to their maximum Augmentation Capacity and count their used Capacity as 2 lower for the purposes of Augmentation Shock. You and your Pok\u00e9mon can install multiple Augmentations in the same Slot.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Upgrader, Expert Technology Edu"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.84"}}

Pact Gift - Glaciate.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Glaciate","description":"You learn the Move Glaciate.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Kyurem and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Focused Command.embed: {"title":"Focused Command","description":"You may have a second Pok\u00e9mon take a turn this round, but both Pok\u00e9mon can only take At-Will actions that round. You may pay 1 AP at the beginning of the round to lift the Frequency Restriction OR the Damage Penalty for the remainder of the round, or pay 2 AP to lift both.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Master Command, one of Focus, Guile, Intimidate, or Pok\u00e9mon Education at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action + Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Major Gift - Drain Will.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Drain Will","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You and the Target make opposed Focus Checks. Weapon Finesse.embed: {"title":"Weapon Finesse","description":"After the attack is resolved, you may immediate- ly use a Disarm, Trip, or Push Maneuver against that foe as a Free Action. Devious.embed: {"title":"Devious","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately use a naturally Dark-Typed Status-Class Move or a Move with the Social keyword as a Free Action. This must be a different Move than the triggering Move, and must follow all Frequency limitations. Devious may be used only once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Clever Ruse, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Dark-Type Pok\u00e9mon uses a Move with the Social keyword."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Fey Law.embed: {"title":"Fey Law","description":"Choose one of the following: Status-Class, Combat Maneuver, attacks with an unmodified Damage Base 10 or higher, or an Elemental Type. The triggering foe is Bound; they suffer a -X penalty to all rolls made to use attacks with the chosen trait. X is equal to half your Charm or Occult Education Rank. The Bound condition lasts until the end of a Scene. You may unbind someone as a Free Action at any time. A target may not have multiple instances of Bound applied at once.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glamour Weaver"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"You hit a foe with a damaging Fairy attack"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Blazing Inferno.embed: {"title":"Blazing Inferno","description":"You becoming Blazing. While you are Blaz- ing, whenever your Fire-Type Moves Inflict Burn, the Burned target immediately loses a Tick of Hit Points, and loses an additional Combat Stage in Defense. While Blazing, when you hit a foe with a damaging Fire-Type Move, you may choose to automatically burn one target of the Move. If you do, you lose the Blazing Condition after the Move's effects are resolved.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack and Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fire Breather Rank 2, Master Focus or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.73"}}

Alarm Runes.embed: {"title":"Alarm Runes","description":"You give the Glyph a Trigger, which may be as vague or as precise as you like (i.e.: \"If anyone enters the room\", \"if James peeks in my diary\", \"If a Torkoal uses Surf while I scream the word 'Gelato'\"). If the trigger is met within the Rune's 30 meters, the Rune will become visible, and will begin screeching loudly, alerting any- one nearby. You are capable of hearing this screeching noise in your head, regardless of your current distance. Glyphs will remember their Triggers as long as the AP spent on the Feature is Bound. If you have the Explosive Runes or Sentry Runes Features, you may instruct this Glyph to automatically use the chosen Feature as a Free Action when it is triggered if you have the AP to spend. You may have only one Glyph use Explosive Runes per round, even if multiple Runes are triggered at the same time.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glyph"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Glyph you have put down, regardless of distance"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

{"title":"Enhanced Capsules","description":"Choose one of the Capabilities below which the target Pokémon has. You create a consumable item with the effect below, depending on the chosen Capability. »Glow

»Threaded
»Zapper","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Capsule Science, Master Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 — Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A willing Pokémon with one of the Capabilities listed below"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.5"}}

{"title":"Telekinetic Burst","description":"The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move.
» Kinesis

Pok\u00e9mon rolls +1d6 with Pushed Skills, unless that would cause you to roll more than 6d6; if so, that Pok\u00e9mon rolls with a +3 Bonus instead. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Pushed Skill at a time.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pusher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You Train your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.147"}}

Taskmaster.embed:
{"title":"Taskmaster","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brutal Training, Novice Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will – Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You apply Brutal Training as a Training action"},{"name":"Mechanic – Hardened","value":"Hardened Pokemon receive the following benefits:
» They do not lose Hit Points from acting while Heavily Injured
» Injuries beyond the 5th do not lower their Maximum Hit Points
» If they have 1 or more injuries, they gain +1 to Critical Hit and Effect Range.
» If they have 3 or more injuries, they gain +1 Evasion and +5 to Initiative.
» If they have 5 or more injuries, they gain +5 Damage Reduction.
» If they have 7 or more injuries, they are immune to Loss of Hit Points (but not damage) from all effects.
» If they have 9 or more injuries, they resist all damage one step further."}],"description":"You may grant your Pokémon up to three injuries. If your Pokémon has at least one Injury, it becomes Hardened.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.105"}}

Wind Runner.embed: {"title":"Wind Runner","description":"You gain the Levitate Ability. Double resistance and steps of resistance or immunity beyond that become double weaknesses, normal resistances become normal weaknesses, normal weaknesses become normal resistances, and double weaknesses become double resistance."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Tao Trio Major Gift"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.66"}}
