Deep Cold.embed: {"title":"Deep Cold","description":"The target is Frozen, and has their Attack, Special Attack, and Speed Combat Stages lowered by 1 each. The target is automatically cured of the Frozen Condition after 1 full round. A foe may be affected by Deep Cold only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Glacial Ice, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a damaging Ice-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Agility Training.embed: {"title":"Agility Training","description":"The target becomes Agile until the end of the effect duration. Agile Pok\u00e9mon gain a +1 bonus to Movement Capabilities and +4 to Initiative.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Training][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Athletics, Untrained Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.60"}}

Complex Orders.embed: {"title":"Complex Orders","description":"You may choose a different Order to give to each Target. You must pay all AP costs and follow Frequency restrictions for all Orders used in this way.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander, at least two Features with the [Orders] Tag that have targets"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Shift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You give [Orders] that have targets."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Oceanic Feeling.embed: {"title":"Oceanic Feeling","description":"You may activate Oceanic Feeling when either Wash Away or Storm Drain would be triggered to gain that Ability for 1 full round, if you do not already have it, and immediately Trigger it. Activating an Ability this way ignores its usual Frequency. You may use each Ability once per Scene this way.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Water\u2019s Shroud, Master Athletics or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"See Text"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Major Gift - Magma Spirit.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Magma Spirit","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For the next three rounds, foes within 6 meters of you do not gain the benefits of Sunny Day. Their Fire Type Moves do not deal extra damage, Solar Beam retains the default charge time, Abilities based on Sunny Weather do not activate, and Moves such as Synthesis do not gain added benefit. All detrimental effects of Sunny Day still apply."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Landmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Wavecrasher.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Wavecrasher","description":"You gain the Fountain Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Seamaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Pact Gift - Aeroblast.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Aeroblast","description":"You learn the Move Aeroblast.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Lugia and Shared Tower Duo Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Pact Gift - Shadow Force.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Shadow Force","description":"You learn the Move Shadow Force.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Giratina and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Doom Desire.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Doom Desire","description":"You learn the Move Doom Desire.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Eye of Truth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Advanced Capture Techniques.embed: {"title":"Advanced Capture Techniques","description":"At each Rank, you gain two Capture Techniques of your choice, found on the next page. You must meet any prerequisites of the Technique. You may qualify for Advanced Capture Techniques' prerequisites with the Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, Survival, Guile, or Perception Skills only.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Capture Specialist"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Capture Specialist, any 2 Skills at Adept Rank"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Capture Specialist, any 2 Skills at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Rank 4 Prerequisites","value":" Capture Specialist, any 3 Skills at Expert Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.78"}}

Druid's Call.embed: {"title":"Druid's Call","description":"6 small saplings, flowery bushes, or mushroom patches (depending on your oath) suddenly grow within 6 meters of you, occupying 1 square each. This veg- etation lasts until the end of the encounter, and acts as rough terrain that blocks line of sight for Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers without the Naturewalk (Forest) Capability. Whenever you use a Move learned through Nature's Embrace, you may have it originate from these Plants as if they were the user. This Feature must be used on soil, or terrain under which soil is hidden by only a few inches (such as most sidewalks, parking lots, gravel or woodchip lots, etc.)","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Green Path (Flower Oath)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.79"}}

Critical Moment.embed: {"title":"Critical Moment","description":"The bonuses from your Pokemon's [Training] are tripled until the end of your next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elite Trainer, Adept Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokemon with [Training] Features applied"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Brightest Flame.embed: {"title":"Brightest Flame","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon's damaging Fire-Type Moves Burn their target on a roll of 18+. If a Move already has a chance to Burn a target, this Effect Range is instead increased by +3. Additionally, your Pok\u00e9mon's damaging Fire-Type Moves deal additional damage equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank against Burned targets.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Fire)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Pheromone Markers.embed: {"title":"Pheromone Markers","description":"The triggering foe gains 1 Pheromone Stack. Your Bug-Type attacks gain a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and +1 Critical Hit range against foes for each Pheromone Stack they have. Once per Scene per foe, when they gain their third or higher Pheromone Stack, you may choose to roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the foe becomes Con- fused; on a result of 3 or 4 the foe becomes Suppressed; on a result of 5 or 6 the foe becomes Enraged.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Enhanced Embrace Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit a foe with a damaging Bug-Type attack"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Stalwart Bastion.embed: {"title":"Stalwart Bastion","description":"While this Feature is Bound, you and all cardinally adjacent allies gain Damage Reduction equal to your Combat or Focus Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fortress"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.57"}}

Earthshifter.embed: {"title":"Earthshifter","description":"You initiate a Trip Maneuver against 1 target of the Move. The Maneuver automatically hits, and you may use your Focus or Intuition for the opposed check","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ground Out"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit with a damaging Ground Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.81"}}

Flight.embed: {"title":"Flight","description":"You gain a Sky Speed equal to your Levitate Speed plus your Acrobatics or Perception Rank for the remainder of the round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One With the Winds, Adept Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.75"}}

Major Gift - Dreamspinner.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Dreamspinner","description":"You gain the Dreamspinner Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Oneiromancy, Major Gift - Dream Augury"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Eye of Truth.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Eye of Truth","description":"Target: Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You can determine whether or not a professed desire by the Target is being sought for altruistic reasons or not."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Watchful Sleep"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Code Injection.embed:
{"title":"Code Injection","description":"You may use any of the Glitches below. They are treated as a Status-Class attack with an AC of 2. You may only use each Glitch once per Scene, and each target may only be affected by Code Injection once per Scene.
»Object Not Found
»Access Denied
»Blue Screen","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Corrupt Reality"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP — Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pokémon or Trainer within 5 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.86"}}

Major Gift - Storm of the Century.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Storm of the Century","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"At the beginning of your next three turns, push all foes within 5 meters of you 1 meter away, and they lose a Tick of HP."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Tower\u2019s Rejuvenation"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Touch of the Flayed One.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Touch of the Flayed One","description":"Trigger: You inflict Injuries on a Target.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You inflict an additional Injury."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Death Dealer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Skill Monkey.embed: {"title":"Skill Monkey","description":"You may re-roll the triggering Skill Check with a +2 Bonus, taking the new result. This Feature may be used to re-roll a specific roll only once.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Three Skills at Adept Rank or higher"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make a Skill Check"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

PK Combat.embed: {"title":"PK Combat","description":"You may also wield weapons and items with your Telekinesis capability, as long as you are able to lift them. This means you may use Items and Melee Weapons that normally require you to be adjacent to your target at a range limited only by your Telekinesis. When wielding Weapons with your Telekinesis, you qualify for Moves using Focus instead of Combat and may add your Special Attack instead of your Attack Stat. The Attacks remain Physical, however.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telekinetic, Adept Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 1 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.191"}}

Hex Maniac.embed: {"title":"Hex Maniac","description":"Choose Cursed Body or Omen. You gain the Chosen Ability","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Cruel Gaze.embed: {"title":"Cruel Gaze","description":"You learn the Moves Glare and Headbutt.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Roughneck, Expert Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.171"}}

Psionic Sight.embed: {"title":"Psionic Sight","description":"You are able to visibly see any Psychic Residue left on Humans or Pok\u00e9mon due to the effects of Psionic abilities. Each Human or Pok\u00e9mon leaves distinct Psychic Residue on their targets; you are easily able to distinguish which targets have been affected by the same Psionic, though to identify that Psionic you need to have a way of knowing their signature (such as simply seeing them do it, and seeing the resulting signature).","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.64"}}

Deadly Gambit.embed: {"title":"Deadly Gambit","description":"The triggering attack automatically hits as if it was a Critical Hit. Before damage resolves, your Pok\u00e9mon may use a 1-Target damaging attack on the foe making the triggering attack as an Interrupt, Frequency allowing, and also automatically hits as a Critical Hit. Damage for both attacks then resolve at the same time.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"5 Taskmaster Features, Master Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is the target of a foe's damaging melee attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.106"}}

Quick Reflexes.embed: {"title":"Quick Reflexes","description":"You gain the Dodge Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tumbler, Expert Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Upheaval.embed: {"title":"Upheaval","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon may make a Trip Attempt as a Free Action against any Pok\u00e9mon targeted by the Move, or standing on a square changed by the Groundshaper capability. Your Pok\u00e9mon gains a bonus to their Combat Roll equal to half of your Type-Linked Skill Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses the Groundshaper Capability, or a Move with the Groundsource keyword"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.125"}}

Expand Horizons.embed: {"title":"Expand Horizons","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains 3 Tutor Points. A Pok\u00e9mon may be targeted by Expand Horizons only once.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Mentor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Champion of Steel.embed: {"title":"Champion of Steel","description":"The attack or Move increases your Defense by 1 Combat Stage on 16+ and you may have it deal Steel- Type Damage if you wish.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You make a Weapon Attack."}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Major Gift - Diamond Storm.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Diamond Storm","description":"You learn the Move Diamond Storm.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Magic Bounce"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Pact Gift - Spacial Rend.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Spacial Rend","description":"You learn the Move Spacial Rend.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Palkia and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Mark of Loyalty.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mark of Loyalty","description":"Target: Your Pok\u00e9mon","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Treat the Target as if it were one Loyalty higher for the rest of this turn."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Stoic Stature"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.59"}}

Major Gift - Storm of the Fallen World.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Storm of the Fallen World","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"For 5 rounds, the area becomes Bugged. While Bugged, all combatants are treated as if they have had the Move Heal Block applied to them, all combatants become Typeless and all effects deal only Typeless damage. At the beginning of each round, all combatants lose 1\/16th of their maximum Hit Points."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Detect Heretic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God","description":"You gain the Giftsapper Feature regardless of prerequisites, and you are not bound by its requirements with respect to Gifts. Giftsapper when gained this way has no effect on Gifts granted by MissingNo.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Detect Heretic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.70"}}

Crystal Artificer.embed: {"title":"Crystal Artificer","description":"You may use any Crystal Artificer Recipe for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Artificer Research Field, Gem Lore"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.142"}}

One With the Winds.embed: {"title":"One With the Winds","description":"You summon a windy breeze that follows you around. Your sense of touch is extended through this wind, and you can guide it by thought, using it to perceive the shape and texture of objects as long as the wind can reach, even through very small cracks and holes. The range of this effect is equal to your Acrobatics Rank plus Perception Rank in meters.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Wind Runner, Adept Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.75"}}

Major Gift - Soundproof.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Soundproof","description":"You gain the Soundproof Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Dazzling the Stage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Ninja.embed: {"title":"Ninja","description":"You learn the Moves Double Team and Poison Powder.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Stealth, Novice Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Disruption Order.embed: {"title":"Disruption Order","description":"Until the end of user's next turn, all targets hit by the Move are Slowed, suffer a -X to Accuracy Rolls, and are Flinched by Damaging Attacks on 16+.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Insectoid Utility, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a Bug-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.120"}}

Equipment Savant.embed: {"title":"Equipment Savant","description":"Use or Equip an Item or piece of Equipment which would normally require a Standard Action to use or equip. You may not make an Attack with a Weapon this way - using other Items or Equipment that requires \"Attacks\" (such as Cap Cannons or Pok\u00e9 Balls) is acceptable.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Backpacker, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.3"}}

Living Shadow.embed: {"title":"Living Shadow","description":"Your own Shadow can attack others; you may have your Dark Type Moves originate from any Square adjacent to you. If you are fighting among complete darkness, you may have your Dark Type Moves origi- nate from any square within X meters that is completely dark, where X is the higher of your Guile or Stealth Rank. Attacks originating from Living Shadow do not trigger effects that rely on being hit with a melee attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Courage.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Courage","description":"You gain the Courage Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Spirit of Justice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Major Gift - Nomad.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Nomad","description":"You gain the Transporter Ability. Note that this automatically grants you the Move Teleport.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Spatial Awareness"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Stat Link.embed: {"title":"Stat Link","description":"The triggering Pok\u00e9mon gains +1 Combat Stage to your Chosen Stat. (Note: The \"Default\" number of Combat Stages is usually 0)","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Ace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"At the end of your Pok\u00e9mon's turn, their Speed Stat is at its default number of Combat Stages or less."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

Psionic Analysis.embed:
{"title":"Psionic Analysis","description":"You are able to analyze Psychic Residue and can determine the following information about the Trainer or Pokémon that left the residue:
» Whether they are a Human or a Pokémon
» Which Psychic-Type Moves they know
» If they're Human, which of the following Class Features they have","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Witch Hunter, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene — Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Hex Maniac Studies.embed: {"title":"Hex Maniac Studies","description":"Learn two Hex Maniac Moves. You may choose any Move marked with the Hex Maniac Studies Rank you are taking or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+HP]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Hex Maniac"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Hex Maniac"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Hex Maniac, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.182"}}

Hidden Power (Feature).embed: {"title":"Hidden Power (Feature)","description":"You learn the Move Hidden Power. Whenever you use Hidden Power, it may be either Physical or Spe- cial, adding the appropriate Attack Stat.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Rune Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Perseverance.embed: {"title":"Perseverance","description":"The target instead does not gain an Injury. Perseverance may activate only once per Scene per target.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains an Injury"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

{"title":"Fearsome Display","description":"The Move gains additional effects.

Observation Party.embed: {"title":"Observation Party","description":"While they are in a Location in your Travel Archive, your Pok\u00e9mon have the Ability you chose when gaining Travel Archive and gain a +2 bonus to Perception Checks to notice the environment.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Travel Archive, Adept Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Wilderness Guide.embed:
{"title":"Wilderness Guide","description":"Wilderness Guide's effect depends on your current terrain.
» Grassland or Forest
» Ocean or Wetlands
» Desert or Tundra
» Mountain or Cave
» Urban","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP][Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Survivalist, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 — Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.150"}}

Double Shot.embed: {"title":"Double Shot","description":"You may make two Struggle Attacks with a -2 penalty to Accuracy, each targeting the same foe. If the first attack gains the benefit of Aiming Down the Sights or Clear Shot, the second attack also gains the same benefits for free.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman, Adept Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Major Gift - Lightning Rod.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Lightning Rod","description":"You gain the Lightning Rod Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Elemental Soul"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.58"}}

Musician.embed:
{"title":"Musician","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class] [+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Charm, Novice Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Mechanic: Songs","value":"Musician Songs can be triggered one of four ways. Regardless of the Area of Effect, Songs always affect the user.
» When using a Move with the Sonic keyword, Songs may be triggered as a Swift Action, and the Song’s Area of Effect is the same as the triggering Move’s.
» When using a Dance Move, Songs may be triggered as a Shift Action with an Area of Effect of Burst 2.
» As a Standard Action, you may trigger one Song, with an Area of Effect of Burst 4.
» As a Full Action, you may trigger two Songs, each with an Area of Effect of Burst 4."}],"description":"You may use Musician Songs.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.164"}}

Herb Lore.embed: {"title":"Herb Lore","description":"You may create Energy Powder, Heal Powder, or Poultices from ingredients, as listed below.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Seed Bag Rank 1"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Energy Powder","value":" A Sitrus Berry or Tiny Mushroom creates x2 Energy Powders. An Energy Root creates x3 Energy Powders."},{"name":"Heal Powder","value":" A Lum Berry or Big Mushroom creates x2 Heal Powders. A Revival Herb creates x3 Heal Powders"},{"name":"Poultice","value":"x1 Energy Powder and x1 Heal Powder create x3 Poultices."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.143"}}

Tornado Charge.embed: {"title":"Tornado Charge","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains 2 additional Standard Actions this turn. Your Pok\u00e9mon may also Shift between taking each action, so long as their total Movement does not exceed their Movement Capabilities. All three of your Pok\u00e9mon's Standard Actions this turn must be used to perform Zephyr Shield, or Flying-Type Moves with a Frequency of At-Will or EOT. Tornado Charge may be used only once per day per Pok\u00e9mon.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Celerity, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Initiative"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Lucky Clover Grand Finale.embed: {"title":"Lucky Clover Grand Finale","description":"You learn the Moves Moonblast and Aromatic Mist.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Passionato Harmony, Master Charm or Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.71"}}

Sharpen Shadows.embed: {"title":"Sharpen Shadows","description":"You learn Dark Pulse and Night Slash","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller, Expert Guile or Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Frost Touched.embed: {"title":"Frost Touched","description":"Choose two out of Haze, Ice Shard, Mist, and Powder Snow. You learn the Chosen Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Ice), Novice Athletics, Novice Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.83"}}

Sovereignty.embed: {"title":"Sovereignty","description":"While this Feature is bound, you gain a +2 Bonus to Save Checks against Volatile Status Afflictions, and a +2 Bonus to Opposed Checks when defending against being Disarmed, Grappled, Pushed, or Tripped.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Herald of Pride, Expert Command or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.67"}}

Major Gift - Black Yin.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Black Yin","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"All allies within 5 meters may choose to decrease their movement speeds by 1 and raise their evasion by 2 for the next three rounds."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Hero of Ideals"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Power Conduit.embed:
{"title":"Power Conduit","description":"Choose One:
» Trade all Combat Stages for a single Stat between two Channeled Pokémon
» Transfer a Coat from one Channeled Pokémon to another.
» Give up a use of Scene or Daily Move from one willing Channeled Pokémon to regain use of a Scene Move which another Channeled Pokémon has used. This effect may only refresh a Move for each Pokémon once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Channeler, Adept Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP — Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Channeled Pokémon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.180"}}

Major Gift - Ashes of the Phoenix.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Ashes of the Phoenix","description":"Target: Adjacent Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Treat the target as if you had used a Revive on it. The target regains 25% of its maximum HP"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Tower\u2019s Rejuvenation"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

True Power.embed: {"title":"True Power","description":"You gain one of the Domains and its corresponding Legendary Aura associated with your Legendary Form. This Feature may be taken multiple times, but with the second time at Pokemon Form Level 60, and the third at Pokemon Form level 75.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shared Strengths Rank 2, Pokemon Form Level 40"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.52"}}

Culinary Appreciation.embed: {"title":"Culinary Appreciation","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Gluttony Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Signer.embed: {"title":"Signer","description":"Choose a Rank 1 Blessing. You gain this Blessing in the form of a Sign. Signs store the energy of the Divine, and may be activated as a Swift Action. Signs can be used once per Scene, and cost 1 AP to activate.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Touched, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.46"}}

Earth Mother's Blessing.embed: {"title":"Earth Mother's Blessing","description":"Each Rank, choose Arena Trap or Lightning Rod. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Defense]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Earth Shaker, Adept Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Ground Out, Master Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.81"}}

In My Name.embed: {"title":"In My Name","description":"You acquire a Blessing marked with the In My Name Rank you are gaining or lower. You must additionally meet any Prerequisites of the Blessing.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 4][PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Messiah, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Completed a task on behalf of your Patron, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" A Major Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Rank 4 Prerequisites","value":" A Pact Gift, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Note","value":" If your Patron does not have a Pact Gift, you instead require all their Major Gifts to attain Rank 4."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.48"}}

Celerity.embed: {"title":"Celerity","description":"While this Feature is Bound, add your Type- Linked Skill to the target's Initiative. Additionally, if the Target uses a Disengage Maneuver, they may Shift as if Slowed instead of shifting only 1 Meter.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Flying)"},{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders][Stratagem]"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Flying-Type Pok\u00e9mon, or a Pok\u00e9mon with a Sky or Levitate Speed"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Type Expertise.embed: {"title":"Type Expertise","description":"Each Rank, choose a Type of which you know at least 3 Moves. You gain STAB for the chosen Type. STAB is never applied to Struggle Attacks.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 2][+Any Stat]"},{"name":"All Ranks Prerequisites","value":"Level 9, 3 Moves of the Chosen Type in your Move List"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

Unconquerable.embed: {"title":"Unconquerable","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon is cured of up to three Status Afflictions.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tyrant\u2019s Roar, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon uses a Dragon-Type Move while they have 3 or more Status Afflictions"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Ninja's Arsenal.embed: {"title":"Ninja's Arsenal","description":"You may craft an Antidote, Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops for $100.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ninja"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.184"}}

Top Percentage.embed: {"title":"Top Percentage","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains an extra Tutor Point. Top Percentage may be used on a single Pok\u00e9mon a maximum of 4 times. Once a Pok\u00e9mon has gained 4 Tutor Points in this way, increase each of that Pok\u00e9mon's Base Stats by +1.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer, Expert Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon levels up to a Level evenly divisible by 5"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.75"}}

Bounce Shot.embed: {"title":"Bounce Shot","description":"After hitting its mark or landing, your Pok\u00e9 Ball bounces 3 meters in any direction. You may have your Pok\u00e9 Ball trigger captures or releases before or after the bounce.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Juggler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You throw a Pok\u00e9 Ball"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.101"}}

Phantom Menace.embed: {"title":"Phantom Menace","description":"You gain the Moves Shadow Claw and Phantom Force. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shadow Arms, Expert Intimidate or Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Call The Current.embed: {"title":"Call The Current","description":"You learn 2 Moves chosen from the list below, marked with the Rank of this Feature you are gaining or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Ranked 3][+Speed]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Maelstrom"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Athletics or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Athletics or Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.93"}}

Strange Energy.embed: {"title":"Strange Energy","description":"You learn the Moves Heal Block and Magic Coat.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warping Ground, Space Distortion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Stay With Us!.embed: {"title":"Stay With Us!","description":"You must be able to Shift to your target to use this Feature. If you can, you immediately do so, and may apply a Potion, Super Potion, Hyper Potion, Energy Powder, or Energy Root. Though damage, injuries, and all other effects of the triggering attack are finalized before this Feature is applied, do not determine if the target has been Fainted, Killed, or gained Injuries from Hit Point Markers until after the effects of the action chosen through use of this Feature has been resolved.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Front Line Healer, Master Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Full Action, Reaction"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"An Ally is hit by an attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.6"}}

New Normal.embed: {"title":"New Normal","description":"You use the highest damage value for the triggering Move. (Examples: Return is DB 9, Wring Out never has its damage decreased due to the target's Hit Points, Retaliate is DB 14) New Normal may only be used once per Scene per Pok\u00e9mon. New Normal may not raise a Move's Damage Base above 14; if a Move would have its Damage Base raised above that value, it is instead raised to 14.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Extra Ordinary, Type-Linked Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a Normal-Type Move with conditional modifiers which increase or decrease its damage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.126"}}

Prescience.embed: {"title":"Prescience","description":"The attack instead misses.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Unveiled Sight, Master Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You are hit by an attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Parfumier.embed: {"title":"Parfumier","description":"Whenever you create an Incense Held Item, choose Sweet Scent or Aromatic Mist. While your Pok\u00e9mon is holding that Incense Item in an active Held Item slot, they add the chosen Move to their Move List.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista, one Fashionista Skill at Expert"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Stone Cold Finish.embed: {"title":"Stone Cold Finish","description":"You learn the Moves Stone Edge and Head Smash.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shards of Stone, Master Combat or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.89"}}

Major Gift.embed: {"title":"Major Gift","description":"You gain one of your Patron\u2019s Major Gifts. Thiis Major Gift may be of your GM\u2019s choosing. This feat is able to be taken multiple times based on your GM\u2019s discretion.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Touched, GM Permission"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.45"}}

Major Gift - Banish.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Banish","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Remove a single Target within 8 meters from the encounter for 1d2+1 rounds. The Target experiences no loss of time. They reappear in the same spot that they disappeared from, or in the nearest unoccupied space."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - Realm Portal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Hobbyist.embed: {"title":"Hobbyist","description":"You gain three Skill Edges for which you qualify. Major Gift - Turboblaze.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Turboblaze","description":"You gain the Turboblaze Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift - White Yang"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.67"}}

Major Gift - Mirage.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Mirage","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You create a small Illusion, covering a cubic area two meters on each side. The Illusion can emulate visual and auditory senses only. Seeing through the Illusion is a DC 15 Perception Check, with a +5 bonus to the check if the Illusion is emulating something very familiar to the observer. The Illusion may be sustained for up to ten minutes as a Swift Action each round."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Motherly Compassion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily\/25 - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Major Gift - Drought.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Drought","description":"You gain the Drought Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Landmaster"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Bounty of Life.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Bounty of Life","description":"Target: A Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer.","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"The Target is cured of all Injuries and Status Ailments."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Rejuvenating Aura"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Signature Move.embed: {"title":"Signature Move","description":"Choose a Move you know. Increase the Move's Frequency one step, as if you had used a PP Up. This choice cannot be changed once made. This Feature may not select Moves known through temporary means, nor can these Moves be used to qualify for this Feature.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Any Stat]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Learned four Moves"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.63"}}

I Meant to Do That.embed: {"title":"I Meant to Do That","description":"Choose one of your equipped items you created with Improved Gadgets. It is destroyed and cannot be repaired, and that instance of Improvised Gadgets is immediately Unbound. Use the effect below corresponding to the Capability granted by the chosen item.\n\u00bbMagnetic\n\u00bbThreaded","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Improvised Gadgets, Adept Technology Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Special"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You must have at least one Equipment Item you created with Improvised Gadgets equipped to use this Feature."},{"name":"Zapper","value":"You may activate this effect as a Swift Action upon hitting a foe with a Zapper-modified Struggle Attack. The foe is Paralyzed."}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.5"}}

Scheme Twist.embed: {"title":"Scheme Twist","description":"You may target up to two additional Allies with the [Orders].","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Commander, Master Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You give [Orders] with a Daily or Scene Frequency that have Targets."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.81"}}

Marksman.embed: {"title":"Marksman","description":"You gain the Sniper Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Combat, Novice Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Robofighter.embed: {"title":"Robofighter","description":"As long as this feature is Bound, you can command your Pok\u00e9bot using a Standard Action rather than a Pok\u00e9mon turn. Your Pok\u00e9bots may still only act once a round.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Engineer, Adept Technology Educa- tion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"DPDoM: p.80"}}

Major Gift - Sky Spirit.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Sky Spirit","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"To use Sky Spirit, the current Weather must be Clear as a result of Defog or Air Lock. For the next five rounds, foes within 10 meters of you have their Sky and Levitate Capabilities halved. Allies within 10 meters of you add 10 to their Initiative."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Clear Skies"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Don't Look Away.embed: {"title":"Don't Look Away","description":"The hit foe loses a Tick of Hit Points, and is Slowed for 1 round. Don't Look Away may be triggered once per round.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Pack Tactics, Adept Stealth, Adept Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon with Pack Hunt or Teamwork hits with an Attack of Opportunity"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.159"}}

Echoes of the Future.embed: {"title":"Echoes of the Future","description":"You may roll twice and keep the best result.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Breadth of Knowledge, Master General Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon make a roll"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.7"}}

Space Distortion.embed: {"title":"Space Distortion","description":"You learn the Moves Teleport and Ally Switch.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Warper"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Trickster Orders.embed: {"title":"Trickster Orders","description":"You gain the Capricious Whirl and Dazzling Dervish Orders.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Charm or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Swarmlord.embed: {"title":"Swarmlord","description":"Your powers begin to take a er either Arachnid's Embrace or Monarch's Embrace. Depending on your Embrace, you gain an Ability and Stat Tag. Whenever you gain a Swarmlord Feature, you gain the same Stat Tag.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Bug), Novice Survival, Novice Command"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Major Gift - Air Lock.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Air Lock","description":"You gain the Air Lock Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Clear Skies"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.63"}}

Warper.embed: {"title":"Warper","description":"You gain the Probability Control Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Psychic), Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.195"}}

Tutoring.embed: {"title":"Tutoring","description":"When activating this Feature, select a Move known either by yourself or by 3 Pok\u00e9mon you own. This Move is Mastered. As an Extended Action, you may have Pok\u00e9mon spend 2 Tutor Points to learn a Move you have Mastered. Pok\u00e9mon targeted this way can only learn Moves that they could learn by Level Up, TM, Egg Move, or Move Tutor. You may take Tutoring multiple times, each time gaining 3 uses of the Feature","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Pok\u00e9mon Education, a move that you or three of your Pok\u00e9mon know"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"One Time Use x 3 \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.59"}}

Beguiling Dance.embed: {"title":"Beguiling Dance","description":"When creating Dance Moves, you can choose to create a Dance Move that has Range: 4, 1 Target, AC 3, and lowers a Combat Stat (chosen at creation) by -2 Combat Stages. This Move is otherwise the same as other Dance Moves you could create except that Dance Moves created with this template have the Contest Effect Excitement instead of Get Ready!.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Dance Form"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.157"}}

Precision Orders.embed: {"title":"Precision Orders","description":"You gain the Pinpoint Strike and Perfect Aim Orders.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Command or Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Traceur.embed: {"title":"Traceur \u2013 Urban Terrain","description":"The city is your jungle. You gain a +1 Bonus to your Jump Capabilities. Add half your Survival Rank to your Evasion against Push, Trip, and Attack of Opportunity Maneuvers.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Aerialist.embed: {"title":"Aerialist","description":"You learn the Moves Aerial Ace and Splash.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Tumbler"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.173"}}

Miasma's Call.embed: {"title":"Miasma's Call","description":"You learn the moves Acid Armor and Sludge Bomb.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Vile Body, Expert Stealth or Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Enhanced Embrace.embed: {"title":"Enhanced Embrace","description":"Learn two Moves from the list below at the Rank of Enhanced Embrace you are taking or lower. Moves marked with an Embrace require that Embrace to be chosen.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Swarmlord"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Adept Command or Survival"},{"name":"Rank 3 Prerequisites","value":" Expert Command or Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.63"}}

Spark Master.embed: {"title":"Spark Master","description":"Choose Static or Electrodash. You gain the Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Electric), Novice Focus, Novice Acrobatics"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.69"}}

Pact Gift - Origin Tutor.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift - Origin Tutor","description":"Target: Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 3 Tutor Points","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 3 Tutor Points and may make use of any TM or Tutoring effect to learn a single Move regardless of what it is normally capable of learning. It must still pay any Tutor Point costs for this effect. You may only target a Pok\u00e9mon once with Origin Tutor."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Mew Major Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Activate Once\/10 - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.62"}}

Versatile Wardrobe.embed: {"title":"Versatile Wardrobe","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points and then becomes chic. Chic Pok\u00e9mon gain two extra Held Item slots with which they can carry Held Items. However, the items in these slots have no effect and are not treated as equipped. As a Swift Action on their turn, Chic Pok\u00e9mon may swap a currently active Held Item with an item stored in these slots. Chic Pok\u00e9mon may not carry multiple items of the same type or with repeated effects.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Fashionista, two Fashionista Skills at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points remaining"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.137"}}

Researcher.embed: {"title":"Researcher","description":"Choose two Researcher Fields of Study. You may take Features from those Fields with this instance of Researcher. Gain one Feature from a chosen Researcher Field for which you qualify.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"An Education Skill at Novice Rank"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.140"}}

Corrupt Blood.embed: {"title":"Corrupt Blood","description":"You are immune to the Poisoned and Badly Poisoned statuses and resist Poison-type attacks one step further.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Miasmic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.87"}}

Guardian Orders.embed: {"title":"Guardian Orders","description":"You gain the Brace for Impact and Sentinel Stance Orders.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Expert Charm or Intimidate"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.62"}}

Ground Out.embed: {"title":"Ground Out","description":"Pick two of Drill Run, Magnitude, or Mud Bomb. You learn the chosen Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Earth Shaker, Expert Focus or Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.81"}}

Dark Soul.embed: {"title":"Dark Soul","description":"Choose Shadow Tag or Super Luck. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller, Master Guile or Stealth"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Major Gift - Dream Augury.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Dream Augury","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You fall into a deep sleep and have a dream that portends of things to come. If this Major Gift is gained through Cresselia, you learn hints of a favorable situation that will arise soon. If this Major Gift is gained through Darkrai, you learn hints of a dangerous or mournful situation that will arise soon."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Dream Mastery"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Item Mastery.embed: {"title":"Item Mastery","description":"You learn the Moves Fling and Recycle.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Speed]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Backpacker"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"May: p.3"}}

Move Sync.embed: {"title":"Move Sync","description":"The target loses 1 Tutor Point. Pick a Move in the target's Move List. The picked move is now permanently your Chosen Type, and may have different effects. See the Types Changes section (page 468) for more information and suggestions. A Pok\u00e9mon may have only one Move-Sync'd Move in their Move List at a time; to Sync a new Move, the old Move must be forgotten.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Type Ace Features"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon with at least 1 Tutor Point."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.119"}}

Prism.embed: {"title":"Prism","description":"You learn the Moves Flash and Swift.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Normal), Novice General Education, Novice Charm"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.85"}}

Weather Systems.embed: {"title":"Weather Systems","description":"Your Pokemon loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns your choice of Hail, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Sunny Day. The target must be able to learn the chosen Move through Level-Up, TM, or Tutor Moves. If the target has the chosen Move in their Level-Up List, Weather Systems costs no Tutor Points.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Climatology, Expert Survival"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokemon with at least 2 Tutor Point"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.145"}}

Egg Tutor.embed: {"title":"Egg Tutor","description":"The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns any Move from its Egg Move List. A Pok\u00e9mon may be targeted by Egg Tutor only one time.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Move Tutor"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon with at least 2 Tutor Points."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.88"}}

Flood!.embed: {"title":"Flood!","description":"Your Water-Type Pokemon may activate Flood! as a Shift Action to use a damaging Water-Type Move as if had a range of Line 4 or Close Blast 2 instead of its usual range.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Water)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Chemist.embed: {"title":"Chemist","description":"You may craft any Chemistry Recipe for which you qualify using your Chemistry Set.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chemistry Research Field, Repel Crafter"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.144"}}

Tyrant's Roar.embed: {"title":"Tyrant's Roar","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon creates a Burst 2, Slowing all Foes in the area and causing those foes to lose 1 Combat Stage in any Stat in which they have positive Combat Stages","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Type Ace (Dragon)"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits with a Dragon-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.121"}}

Major Gift - Realm Portal.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Realm Portal","description":"Target: Area","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"You open a small portal through your patron\u2019s realm to any location you have visited within 20 miles. The portal lasts for two minutes, during which any living thing which voluntarily wishes to enter the portal may do so; any conscious trainers or Pok\u00e9mon forced through the portal involuntarily will not be affected by the portal. After the two minutes are up or when you step through the portal, it collapses."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Creation Trio Major Gift"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.64"}}

Major Gift - Magma Armor.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Magma Armor","description":"You gain the Magma Armor Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Vulcan's Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.65"}}

Shadow Form.embed: {"title":"Shadow Form","description":"While this Feature is Bound, your appearance becomes wan and obviously otherworldly. Your natural Weaknesses, Resistances, and Immunities change to match that of the Ghost Type. Additionally, while in Shadow Form, you are immune to the Cursed Status (if you were previously Cursed, you are instantly cured upon going into Shadow Form) and gain the Phasing Capability. You may unbind this Feature as a Swift Action, returning to your normal appearance.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Silent Assassin, Expert Intimidate or Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Bind 2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.77"}}

Pact Gift - Psystrike.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift \u2013 Psystrike","description":"You learn the Move Psystrike.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Twin Souls, Expanded Horizons, Mental Suggestion"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Two-Second Preview.embed: {"title":"Two-Second Preview","description":"You gain the Instinct Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"3 Oracle Features, Expert Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.186"}}

Highly Responsive to Prayers.embed: {"title":"Highly Responsive to Prayers","description":"You may use the Sage Feature as a Free Action targeting the triggering ally. Multiple instances of Sage's effect that you use may stack when used this way.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Lay on Hands"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use the Blessed Touch or Healer Ability on an ally, or an ally receives an Injury"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Hits the Spot.embed: {"title":"Hits the Spot","description":"The target gains Temporary Hit Points equal to your Intuition Rank doubled. These Temporary Hit Points stack from any Temporary Hit Points granted by Accentuated Taste, the Digestion Buff or by the Lunchbox Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Chef"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon trade in a Digestion Buff"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.131"}}

Telepathic Awareness.embed: {"title":"Telepathic Awareness","description":"Choose Gentle Vibe or Telepathy. You gain the chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Telepath"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.193"}}

Fire Bringer.embed: {"title":"Fire Bringer","description":"Choose two of Flame Burst, Flame Wheel, Flame Charge, or Will-O-Wisp. You learn the chosen Moves","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][+Attack and Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Elemental Connection (Fire), Novice Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.73"}}

Expend Momentum.embed:
{"title":"Expend Momentum","description":"Apply one of the following effects on the target by spending that much Momentum.
» Spend 1 Momentum
» Spend 2 Momentum
» Spend 3 Momentum","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Duelist"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will — Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon under the effects of Focused Training"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.96"}}

Major Gift - Therian Form.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Therian Form","description":"Target: Self","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"Create an extra stat block for yourself, redistributing any Stat Points you gained from level ups or [+Any Stat] tags as you wish. You may activate this Major Gift during an encounter to swap your stats to the extra stat block for the rest of the encounter. Therian Form may be ended early at any time as a Standard Action. Therian Form automatically deactivates if you Faint. While Therian Form is active, you take on slight Avian, Bestial, or Draconic characteristics depending on your patron Legendary."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Cloud Reading"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.61"}}

Sword of Body and Soul.embed: {"title":"Sword of Body and Soul","description":"You may have the triggering Move deal damage as if it was your choice of Physical or Special Classes. Regardless, add both your Attack and Special Attack Stats to the Damage Roll, and this attack ignores Damage Reduction. This does not stack with Twisted Power.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Aura Guardian, Adept Intuition"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a damaging Aura Guardian Move against an adjacent foe"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.177"}}

Aiming Down The Sights.embed: {"title":"Aiming Down The Sights","description":"Your next Weapon Attack with a long-range Weapon gains +2 to its Accuracy Roll and Critical Hit Range. This effect lasts until used or until the start of your next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack][Weapon]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Marksman"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At Will \u2014 Shift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.59"}}

Trickster.embed: {"title":"Trickster","description":"After the Move is resolved, your Pok\u00e9mon may perform a Dirty Trick or Manipulate Maneuver on that foe as a Free Action. The Maneuver automatically hits, but the target must be in range for the chosen Maneuver. Use your own Guile to resolve Manipulate Rolls.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Novice Guile"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon hits a foe with a Status-Class Move or a foe triggers your Pok\u00e9mon's Hazard"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.108"}}

Impenetrable.embed: {"title":"Impenetrable","description":"You gain the Bulletproof Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Defense]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Steelheart, Expert Athletics or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.91"}}

Words of Power.embed: {"title":"Words of Power","description":"Instead of a Burst, you may choose to have Hidden Power be a 1 Target Melee, 1 Target 6m, or Cone 2. Additionally, you and your Prime Unown always have STAB on Hidden Power as if you or they were of the same Type.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Adept Occult Education, Hidden Power Static"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You or your Pok\u00e9mon use Hidden Power"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.51"}}

Twisted Soul.embed: {"title":"Twisted Soul","description":"You gain the Twisted Power Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack or Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Shade Caller"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.65"}}

Authentic Thaumaturgy.embed: {"title":"Authentic Thaumaturgy","description":"You may apply a Rank 2 Power Manipulation to your attack.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Special Attack]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Arcanist, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You use a Special Move"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.54"}}

Marsh Stomper.embed: {"title":"Marsh Stomper \u2013 Wetland Terrain","description":"You can handle the toxic fauna and flora of the marshes. You do not lose Hit Points from Poison and lose only 1 instead of 2 Combat Stages from Poison. You still count as Poisoned for the purpose of Moves and effects.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Trail Blazer.embed: {"title":"Trail Blazer","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon sets the ground aflame and leaves a Fire Hazard in each square it shifts through this round, up to a maximum of 8 squares. Anyone who begins or ends their turn on a Fire Hazard are Burned. Anyone that passes through a Fire Hazard loses a Tick of Hit Points. If a Ground, Rock, or Water-Type Move targets a square (or a target in a square) with Fire Hazard in them, the Fire Hazards are destroyed. All effects that destroy Hazards extinguish Fire Hazards. Trail Blazer may only be used once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Brightest Flame, Type-Linked Skill at Adept"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Fire-Type Pok\u00e9mon Shifts"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.123"}}

Plains Runner.embed: {"title":"Plains Runner \u2013 Grassland Terrain","description":"Your Overland Speed is increased by +2. You gain a +2 bonus to Perception Checks to spot or identify objects in the far distance.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Surefooted.embed: {"title":"Surefooted \u2013 Mountain Terrain","description":"You\u2019re not afraid of precarious ledges and steep hills. You gain a +2 Bonus to Skill Checks made to climb, balance, or maintain footing \u2013 including resisting Push and Trip maneuvers. Whenever you take falling damage, ignore one meter and receive one less Injury when determining damage.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Cave Dweller.embed: {"title":"Cave Dweller \u2013 Cave Terrain","description":"Your eyes are used to very low levels of light. You do not suffer Blindness for being in Low-Light conditions. If you would be Totally Blinded by complete darkness, you instead suffer the penalties of Blindness, and may make Survival Checks instead of Acrobatics to avoid becoming Tripped. You are immune to Stealth Rock Hazards.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Forest Ranger.embed: {"title":"Plains Runner \u2013 Forest Terrain","description":"You\u2019re used to navigating the dense plant life of large forests. You gain the Stealth Capability.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Arctic Pilgrim.embed: {"title":"Arctic Pilgrim \u2013 Tundra Terrain","description":"Neither deep, slow, nor slippery ice can deter you. You are immune to the effects of Hail and to the Frozen condition, and gain 5 Damage Reduction against Ice- Type attacks.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Major Gift - Heart Swap.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Heart Swap","description":"You learn the Move Heart Swap.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Sailor's Guardian"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Deep Diver.embed: {"title":"Deep Diver \u2013 Ocean Terrain","description":"You love nothing better than the smell of the sea. Your Swimming Capability is equal to your Overland Capability instead of half. Additionally, you may hold your breath underwater for a number of minutes equal to your Survival Rank before you start suffocating.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.151"}}

Major Gift - Negate Emotion.embed: {"title":"Major Gift - Negate Emotion","description":"Target: Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters","fields":[{"name":"Effect","value":"The Target becomes immune to Enraged, Confused, and Infatuation Status for the remainder of the encounter and are cured of the Status Afflictions if they currently have them. However, the Target is treated as if their Intimidate, Charm, Intuition and Guile Skills were at Pathetic Rank for the next fifteen minutes. The target becomes immune to further uses of Negate Emotion for 24 hours."},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift - Emotion's Heart"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"3 AP - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.60"}}

Targeted Profiling.embed: {"title":"Targeted Profiling","description":"On the target's next turn, they act as if they had the Mold Breaker Ability against all Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers in your Profile Archive and gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls against these targets.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Orders]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Profile Archive, Expert Perception"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.134"}}

Stat Ace.embed: {"title":"Stat Ace","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon have their Chosen Base Stat increased by +1, and by +1 more for every 10 Levels they have (for example, a Level 20 Pok\u00e9mon would have your Chosen Stat's base value increased by +3). Additionally, your Pok\u00e9mon may ignore Base Relations, as long as they are adding to your Chosen Stat, and you do not need to \"correct\" Stats due to this inflated Stat Value.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Class][Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ace Trainer or Style Expert, 1 Poke\u0301mon with the chosen stat of 15 or more, Novice Command or Focus"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

Training Regime.embed:
{"title":"Training Regime","description":"You gain additional static bonuses based on your Trained Stats.
» Attack
» Defense
» Special Attack
» Special Defense
» Speed","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Athlete"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.155"}}

Major Gift - God Crusher.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 God Crusher","description":"You gain the Godslayer Feature. If you already possess the Godslayer Feature, you may instead take another Feature for which you qualify for instead. When using Godslayer, the AC is now 8, and you do not suffer from feedback.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 World Serpent\u2019s Embrace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Major Gift - Expanded Horizons.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Expanded Horizons","description":"You gain either the Telepath or Telekinetic Capability. If you possess both of these from their respected Trainer Classes, you instead gain the Godslayer Feature.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Minor Gift \u2013 Twin Souls"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.69"}}

Front Line Healer.embed: {"title":"Front Line Healer","description":"When you apply a Restorative, you gain +5 Damage Reduction for 1 full round. Whenever you use Combat Medic's Primer's Rank 2 effect, you may apply the same effect on yourself. Damage Reduction from this Feature does not stack with itself.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Medic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.6"}}

Rainbow Light.embed: {"title":"Rainbow Light","description":"You create a Rainbow lasting one full round. While this Rainbow persists, the Effect Range of all Allies is increased by +3.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Crystal Artificer, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Standard Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You are wearing a Rainbow Gem"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.142"}}

Divine Wind.embed: {"title":"Divine Wind","description":"Choose a type of Blessing you can generate with a Sage Move. All Blessings you generated of another type become Blessings of the chosen type. This may not be used to generate more uses of a Blessing than the original Move creates. For example, three Lucky Chant Blessings would become two Reflect or Light Screen Blessings, not three. You may only choose a Blessing type once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage\u2019s Benediction, Master Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"2 AP \u2014 Free Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Target","value":"Blessings you generated with a Sage Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Fire Breather.embed: {"title":"Fire Breather","description":"Learn two Fire Bringer Moves from the list below. You may choose any Move marked with the Fire Breather Rank you are taking or lower.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+Attack and Special Attack]"},{"name":"Rank 1 Prerequisites","value":"Fire Bringer, Expert Focus or Combat"},{"name":"Rank 2 Prerequisites","value":" Master Focus or Combat"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"GoT: p.73"}}

Lay on Hands.embed: {"title":"Lay on Hands","description":"Choose Blessed Touch or Healer. You gain the Chosen Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sage, Expert Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Medical Techniques.embed: {"title":"Medical Techniques","description":"The target of the triggering action gains a Tick of Hit Points, plus an additional amount of Hit Points equal to your Medicine Education Rank.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Medic, Adept Medicine Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You apply a Restorative Item"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.6"}}

Stat Training.embed:
{"title":"Stat Training","description":"Your Pokémon loses 1 Tutor Point, and learns a Move based on your Chosen Stat, even if your Pokémon cannot normally learn this Move.","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[Branch]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Stat Ace"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will — Extended Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Your Pokémon with at least 1 Tutor Point"},{"name":"Moves","value":"» Attack: Swords Dance or Rage
» Defense: Iron Defense or Reflect
» Special Attack: Nasty Plot or Hidden Power
» Special Defense: Amnesia or Light Screen
» Speed: Agility or After You"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.112"}}

True Steel.embed: {"title":"True Steel","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Polished Shine, Type-Linked Skill at Master"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"Your Steel-Type Pok\u00e9mon is hit by a damaging attack"}],"description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon gains Damage Reduction against the attack equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Additionally, calculate Type Effectiveness with this attack as if your Pok\u00e9mon has no Typings besides Steel.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.128"}}

Sage's Benediction.embed:
{"title":"Sage's Benediction","description":"The triggering ally gains an additional benefit as follows, depending on the Move used. The benefit takes effect after the Blessing and the attack that triggered it are resolved.
» Reflect
» Light Screen
» Safeguard
» Lucky Chant","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[+HP]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Sacred Shield or Mystic Defense, Adept Occult Education"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"1 AP — Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An ally activates one of your Moves with the Blessing Keyword."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.189"}}

Major Gift - Dark Aura.embed: {"title":"Major Gift \u2013 Dark Aura","description":"You gain the Dark Aura Ability.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Major Gift \u2013 Touch of the Flayed One"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Gift of Command.embed: {"title":"Gift of Command","fields":[{"name":"Tags","value":"[PATRON STAT]"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"One Major Gift from Your Patron Legendary"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static | 2 AP - Standard Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Static Effect","value":"You sense the presence of and can identify those with Gifts coming from your patron\u2019s subservient Poke\u0301mon. You know which Gifts someone has from your patron\u2019s subservient Poke\u0301mon by looking at them."},{"name":"2 AP Effect","value":"Target Trainer within 8 meters with a Gift from your patron\u2019s subservient Poke\u0301mon has the Gift of your choice from that subservient Poke\u0301mon disabled for the next ten minutes."}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.53"}}

Pact Gift - Oblivion Wing.embed: {"title":"Pact Gift \u2013 Oblivion Wing","description":"You learn the Move Oblivion Wing.","fields":[{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"All Yveltal Major Gifts and Shared Mortality Duo Gifts"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"BntD: p.68"}}

Seize The Moment.embed: {"title":"Seize The Moment","description":"Your Pok\u00e9mon loses 6 Momentum, and then gains +1 Momentum. Your Pok\u00e9mon may immediately make an attack as an Interrupt, but this attack must target only a Tagged Foe. If the attack misses, it still deals damage as if it had the Smite keyword. If the attack hits, it's automatically a Critical Hit. If it would have already been a Critical Hit, your Pok\u00e9mon gains Hit Points equal to half of its maximum Hit Points.
